 23717                                  ;============================================================================
 23718                                  ; DIR2.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 23719                                  ;============================================================================
 23720                                  ; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 23721                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 23722                                  
 23723                                  ;	TITLE	DIR2 - Directory and path cracking
 23724                                  ;	NAME	Dir2
 23725                                  
 23726                                  ;Break	<GETPATH -- PARSE A WFP>
 23727                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23728                                  ;
 23729                                  ; Procedure Name : GETPATH
 23730                                  ;
 23731                                  ; Inputs:
 23732                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:\" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 23733                                  ;		terminated; d:/ (note forward slash) indicates a real device).
 23734                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 23735                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 23736                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 23737                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 23738                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 23739                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 23740                                  ;	[THISDPB] set to DPB if disk otherwise garbage.
 23741                                  ; Function:
 23742                                  ;	Crack the path
 23743                                  ; Outputs:
 23744                                  ;	Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk if disk file
 23745                                  ;	Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Unk if char device
 23746                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 23747                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 23748                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 23749                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 23750                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 23751                                  ;	   Zero set
 23752                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 23753                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 23754                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 23755                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 23756                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 23757                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 23758                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 23759                                  ;	   Zero reset
 23760                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path or attribute mismatch
 23761                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 23762                                  ;	ELSE
 23763                                  ;	   [CurBuf] = -1 if root directory
 23764                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 23765                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 23766                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points into [CURBUF] to dir_first field for entry
 23767                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 23768                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 23769                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 23770                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 23771                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 23772                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 23773                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 23774                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it.
 23775                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 23776                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 23777                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 23778                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 23779                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 23780                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 23781                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 23782                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 23783                                  ; DS preserved, Others destroyed
 23784                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23785                                  
 23786                                  ;hkn; called from delete.asm, finfo.asm, mknode.asm and rename.asm.
 23787                                  ;hkn; DS already set up at this point.
 23788                                  
 23789                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23790                                  GETPATH:
 23791                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E500h
 23792 00003FA6 C706[7E05]00E5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256+0 ; Not Creating, not DEL *.*
 23793                                  
 23794                                  ; Same as GetPath only CREATING and DELALL already set
 23795                                  
 23796                                  	;entry	GetPathNoSet
 23797                                  GetPathNoSet:
 23798                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],2	
 23799 00003FAC C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 23800 00003FB1 C706[E205]FFFF          	MOV	word [CURBUF],-1	; initial setting
 23801                                  
 23802                                  ; See if the input indicates a device that has already been detected. If so,
 23803                                  ; go build the guy quickly. Otherwise, let findpath find the device.
 23804                                  
 23805 00003FB7 8B3E[B205]              	MOV	DI,[WFP_START]		; point to the beginning of the name
 23806                                  	;cmp	word [DI+1],5C3Ah
 23807                                  	;CMP	WORD [DI+1],'\' << 8 + ':'
 23808 00003FBB 817D013A5C              	cmp	word [DI+1],':\'
 23809 00003FC0 7438                    	JZ	short CrackIt
 23810                                  
 23811                                  ; Let ChkDev find it in the device list
 23812                                  
 23813 00003FC2 83C703                  	ADD	DI,3
 23814                                  	; 18/08/2018
 23815                                  	;MOV	SI,DI			; let CHKDEV see the original name
 23816                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 23817                                  	; 16/12/2022
 23818                                  	;mov	si,di ; not required ! (it is written in CHKDEV proc already!)
 23819 00003FC5 E8B000                  	CALL	CHKDEV
 23820 00003FC8 722E                    	JC	short InternalError
 23821                                  
 23822                                  Build_devJ:
 23823 00003FCA A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 23824 00003FCD A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 23825                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],1
 23826 00003FD0 C606[2303]01            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; In the particular case of
 23827                                  					; "finding" a char device
 23828                                  					; set LOCUS to Unknown. This makes
 23829                                  					; certain idiotic problems reported
 23830                                  					; by a certain 3 letter OEM go away.
 23831                                  
 23832                                  ; Take name in name1 and pack it back into where wfp_start points. This
 23833                                  ; guarantees wfp_start pointing to a canonical representation of a device.
 23834                                  ; We are allowed to do this as GetPath is *ALWAYS* called before entering a
 23835                                  ; wfp into the share set.
 23836                                  ;
 23837                                  ; We copy chars from name1 to wfp_start remembering the position of the last
 23838                                  ; non-space seen +1.  This position is kept in DX.
 23839                                  
 23840                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 23841 00003FD5 16                      	push	ss
 23842 00003FD6 07                      	pop	es
 23843                                  
 23844                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 23845 00003FD7 BE[4B05]                	mov	si,NAME1
 23846 00003FDA 8B3E[B205]              	mov	di,[WFP_START]
 23847 00003FDE 89FA                    	mov	dx,di
 23848 00003FE0 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; 8 chars in device name
 23849                                  MoveLoop:
 23850 00003FE3 AC                      	lodsb
 23851 00003FE4 AA                      	stosb
 23852 00003FE5 3C20                    	cmp	al," "
 23853 00003FE7 7402                    	jz	short NoSave
 23854                                  
 23855 00003FE9 89FA                    	mov	dx,di
 23856                                  NoSave:
 23857 00003FEB E2F6                    	loop	MoveLoop
 23858                                  
 23859                                  ; DX is the position of the last seen non-space + 1. We terminate the name
 23860                                  ; at this point.
 23861                                  
 23862 00003FED 89D7                    	mov	di,dx
 23863 00003FEF C60500                  	mov	byte [di],0		; end of string
 23864 00003FF2 E8D302                  	call	Build_device_ent	; Clears carry sets zero
 23865 00003FF5 FEC0                    	INC	AL			; reset zero
 23866 00003FF7 C3                      	retn
 23867                                  
 23868                                  InternalError:
 23869                                  InternalError_loop:
 23870 00003FF8 EBFE                    	JMP	short InternalError_loop	; freeze
 23871                                  
 23872                                  ; Start off at the correct spot. Optimize if the current dir part is valid.
 23873                                  
 23874                                  CrackIt:
 23875 00003FFA 8B36[B605]              	MOV	SI,[CURR_DIR_END]	; get current directory pointer
 23876 00003FFE 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1			; valid?
 23877 00004001 7503                    	JNZ	short LOOK_SING		; Yes, use it.
 23878 00004003 8D7503                  	LEA	SI,[DI+3]		; skip D:\.
 23879                                  LOOK_SING:
 23880                                  	;mov	byte [ATTRIB],16h
 23881 00004006 C606[6B05]16            	MOV	byte [ATTRIB],attr_directory+attr_system+attr_hidden
 23882                                  					; Attributes to search through Dirs
 23883 0000400B C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 23884 0000400F B8FFFF                  	MOV	AX,-1
 23885                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+73]
 23886 00004012 268B5D49                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+curdir.ID]
 23887 00004016 8B36[B605]              	MOV	SI,[CURR_DIR_END]
 23888                                  
 23889                                  ; AX = -1
 23890                                  ; BX = cluster number of current directory. THis number is -1 if the media
 23891                                  ;      has been uncertainly changed.
 23892                                  ; SI = offset in DOSGroup into path to end of current directory text. This
 23893                                  ;      may be -1 if no current directory part has been used.
 23894                                  
 23895 0000401A 39C6                    	CMP	SI,AX			; if Current directory is not part
 23896 0000401C 7440                    	JZ	short NO_CURR_D		; then we must crack from root
 23897 0000401E 39C3                    	CMP	BX,AX			; is the current directory cluster valid
 23898                                  
 23899                                  ; DOS 3.3  6/25/86
 23900 00004020 743C                    	JZ	short NO_CURR_D		; no, crack form the root
 23901                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],1
 23902 00004022 F606[3A0D]01            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],FastOpen_Set ; for fastopen ?
 23903 00004027 7442                    	JZ	short GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER	; no
 23904 00004029 06                      	PUSH	ES			; save registers
 23905 0000402A 57                      	PUSH	DI
 23906 0000402B 51                      	PUSH	CX
 23907 0000402C FF74FF                  	PUSH	word [SI-1]		; save \ and 1st char of next element
 23908 0000402F 56                      	PUSH	SI
 23909 00004030 53                      	PUSH	BX
 23910                                  
 23911 00004031 C644FF00                	MOV	BYTE [SI-1],0		; call fastopen to look up cur dir info
 23912 00004035 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 23913                                  
 23914                                  ;hkn; FastOpenTable, Dir_Info_Buff & FastOpen_Ext_Info are in DOSDATA
 23915 00004039 BB[300D]                	MOV	BX,FastOpenTable
 23916 0000403C BF[460D]                	MOV	DI,Dir_Info_Buff
 23917 0000403F B9[3B0D]                	MOV	CX,FastOpen_Ext_Info
 23918                                  	;mov	al,1
 23919 00004042 B001                    	MOV	AL,FONC_Look_up
 23920 00004044 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 23921 00004045 07                      	POP	ES
 23922                                  	;call	far [BX+2]
 23923 00004046 FF5F02                  	CALL	far [BX+fastopen_entry.name_caching]
 23924 00004049 7208                    	JC	short GO_Chk_end1 	;fastopen not installed, or wrong drive.
 23925                                  					; Go to Got_Srch_cluster
 23926 0000404B 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0		;fastopen has current dir info?
 23927 0000404E 7404                    	JE	short GO_Chk_end	;yes. Go to got_search_cluster
 23928 00004050 F9                      	stc
 23929 00004051 EB01                    	jmp	short GO_Chk_end	;Go to No_Curr_D
 23930                                  GO_Chk_end1:
 23931 00004053 F8                      	clc
 23932                                  GO_Chk_end:				; restore registers
 23933 00004054 5B                      	POP	BX
 23934 00004055 5E                      	POP	SI
 23935 00004056 8F44FF                  	POP	word [SI-1]
 23936 00004059 59                      	POP	CX
 23937 0000405A 5F                      	POP	DI
 23938 0000405B 07                      	POP	ES
 23939 0000405C 730D                    	JNC	short GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER ; crack based on cur dir
 23940                                  
 23941                                  ; DOS 3.3  6/25/86
 23942                                  ;
 23943                                  ; We must cract the path beginning at the root. Advance pointer to beginning
 23944                                  ; of path and go crack from root.
 23945                                  
 23946                                  NO_CURR_D:
 23947 0000405E 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 23948 00004062 8D7403                  	LEA	SI,[SI+3]		; Skip "d:/"
 23949 00004065 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; Get ES:BP
 23950 00004069 EB3C                    	JMP	short ROOTPATH
 23951                                  
 23952                                  ; We are able to crack from the current directory part. Go set up for search
 23953                                  ; of specified cluster.
 23954                                  
 23955                                  GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER:
 23956 0000406B C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; Get ES:BP
 23957 0000406F E8D4FE                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 23958                                  	;JC	short SETFERR
 23959                                  	;JMP	short FINDPATH
 23960                                  	; 16/12/2022
 23961 00004072 7344                    	jnc	short FINDPATH ; 17/08/2018
 23962                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 23963                                  	;JC	short SETFERR
 23964                                  	;JMP	short FINDPATH
 23965                                  SETFERR:
 23966 00004074 30C9                    	XOR	CL,CL			; set zero
 23967 00004076 F9                      	STC
 23968 00004077 C3                      	retn
 23969                                  
 23970                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23971                                  ;
 23972                                  ; Procedure Name : ChkDev
 23973                                  ;
 23974                                  ; Check to see if the name at DS:DI is a device. Returns carry set if not a
 23975                                  ;   device.
 23976                                  ; Blasts CX,SI,DI,AX,BX
 23977                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23978                                  
 23979                                  CHKDEV:
 23980 00004078 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 23981 0000407A 8CD7                    	MOV	DI,SS
 23982 0000407C 8EC7                    	MOV	ES,DI
 23983                                  
 23984 0000407E BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 23985 00004081 B90900                  	MOV	CX,9
 23986                                  TESTLOOP:
 23987 00004084 E87F10                  	call	GETLET
 23988                                  
 23989 00004087 3C2E                    	CMP	AL,'.'
 23990 00004089 740E                    	JZ	short TESTDEVICE
 23991 0000408B E8CE10                  	call	PATHCHRCMP
 23992 0000408E 7407                    	JZ	short NOTDEV
 23993 00004090 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 23994 00004092 7405                    	JZ	short TESTDEVICE
 23995                                  
 23996 00004094 AA                      	STOSB
 23997 00004095 E2ED                    	LOOP	TESTLOOP
 23998                                  NOTDEV:
 23999 00004097 F9                      	STC
 24000 00004098 C3                      	retn
 24001                                  
 24002                                  TESTDEVICE:
 24003 00004099 83C102                  	ADD	CX,2
 24004 0000409C B020                    	MOV	AL,' '
 24005 0000409E F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 24006 000040A0 8CD0                    	MOV	AX,SS
 24007 000040A2 8ED8                    	MOV	DS,AX
 24008                                  	;call	DEVNAME
 24009                                  	;retn
 24010                                  	; 18/12/2022
 24011 000040A4 E9C201                  	jmp	DEVNAME
 24012                                  
 24013                                  ;Break	<ROOTPATH, FINDPATH -- PARSE A PATH>
 24014                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24015                                  ;
 24016                                  ; Procedure Name : ROOTPATH,FINDPATH
 24017                                  ;
 24018                                  ; Inputs:
 24019                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but,
 24020                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path which is assumed to start at
 24021                                  ;		the root (no leading '/').
 24022                                  ; Function:
 24023                                  ;	Search from root for path
 24024                                  ; Outputs:
 24025                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but:
 24026                                  ;	If root directory specified, [CURBUF] and [NAME1] are NOT set, and
 24027                                  ;	[NoSetDir] is ignored.
 24028                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24029                                  
 24030                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24031                                  	; DOSCODE:7F47h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24032                                  
 24033                                  ROOTPATH:
 24034 000040A7 E8D7FE                  	call	SETROOTSRCH
 24035 000040AA 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0
 24036 000040AD 7509                    	JNZ	short FINDPATH
 24037                                  
 24038                                  ; Root dir specified
 24039 000040AF A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 24040 000040B2 A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 24041 000040B5 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; Sets "device ID" byte, sets zero
 24042                                  					; (dir), clears carry.
 24043 000040B7 C3                      	retn
 24044                                  
 24045                                  ; Inputs:
 24046                                  ;	[ATTRIB] Set to get through directories
 24047                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Set to find last element
 24048                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 24049                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path (no leading '/').
 24050                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 24051                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Phys sec # of first sector of directory
 24052                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Cluster # of next cluster
 24053                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors per cluster
 24054                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 24055                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 24056                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 24057                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 24058                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 24059                                  ;	[CREATING] and [DELALL] set
 24060                                  ; Function:
 24061                                  ;	Parse path name
 24062                                  ; Outputs:
 24063                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 24064                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 24065                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 24066                                  ;	[THISDPB] = ES:BP
 24067                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 24068                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 24069                                  ;	   Zero set
 24070                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 24071                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 24072                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 24073                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 24074                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 24075                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 24076                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 24077                                  ;	   Zero reset
 24078                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path
 24079                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 24080                                  ;	ELSE
 24081                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 24082                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 24083                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to fcb_FIRCLUS field for entry
 24084                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 24085                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 24086                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 24087                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 24088                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 24089                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 24090                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 24091                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it,
 24092                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 24093                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 24094                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 24095                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 24096                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 24097                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 24098                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 24099                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 24100                                  ; Destroys all other registers
 24101                                  
 24102                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24103                                  	; DOSCODE:7F58h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24104                                  
 24105                                      	;entry	FINDPATH
 24106                                  FINDPATH:
 24107 000040B8 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 24108 000040B9 56                      	PUSH	SI
 24109 000040BA 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 24110 000040BC 8B0E[C205]              	MOV	CX,[DIRSTART]		; Get start clus of dir being searched
 24111 000040C0 833E[B605]FF            	CMP	word [CURR_DIR_END],-1
 24112 000040C5 740E                    	JZ	short NOIDS		; No current dir part
 24113 000040C7 3B3E[B605]              	CMP	DI,[CURR_DIR_END]
 24114 000040CB 7508                    	JNZ	short NOIDS		; Not to current dir end yet
 24115 000040CD C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 24116                                  	;mov	[es:di+73],cx
 24117 000040D1 26894D49                	MOV	[ES:DI+curdir.ID],CX	; Set current directory currency
 24118                                  NOIDS:
 24119                                  
 24120                                  ; Parse the name off of DS:SI into NAME1. AL = 1 if there was a meta
 24121                                  ; character in the string. CX,DI may be destroyed.
 24122                                  ;
 24123                                  ;	invoke	NAMETRANS
 24124                                  ;	MOV	CL,AL
 24125                                  ;
 24126                                  ; The above is the slow method. The name has *already* been munged by
 24127                                  ; TransPath so no special casing needs to be done. All we do is try to copy
 24128                                  ; the name until ., \ or 0 is hit.
 24129                                  
 24130 000040D5 8CD0                    	MOV	AX,SS
 24131 000040D7 8EC0                    	MOV	ES,AX
 24132                                  
 24133                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 24134 000040D9 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 24135 000040DC B82020                  	MOV	AX,'  ' ; 2020h
 24136 000040DF AA                      	STOSB
 24137 000040E0 AB                      	STOSW
 24138 000040E1 AB                      	STOSW
 24139 000040E2 AB                      	STOSW
 24140 000040E3 AB                      	STOSW
 24141 000040E4 AB                      	STOSW
 24142                                  
 24143                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 24144 000040E5 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 24145 000040E8 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; bits for CL
 24146                                  GetNam:
 24147                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24148                                  	;INC	CL ; ?*! ; MSDOS 6.0	;AN000; KK increment volid count
 24149                                  
 24150                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24151                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24152                                  	;inc	cl ; not required !	
 24153                                  	
 24154 000040EA AC                      	LODSB
 24155 000040EB 3C2E                    	CMP	AL,'.'	; 2Eh
 24156 000040ED 7412                    	JZ	short _SetExt
 24157 000040EF 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 24158 000040F1 7424                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 24159 000040F3 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'	; 5Ch
 24160 000040F5 7420                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 24161 000040F7 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'	; 3Fh
 24162 000040F9 7503                    	JNZ	short StoNam
 24163 000040FB 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 24164                                  StoNam: 
 24165 000040FE AA                      	STOSB
 24166 000040FF EBE9                    	JMP	short GetNam
 24167                                  _SetExt:
 24168 00004101 BF[5305]                	MOV	DI,NAME1+8
 24169                                  GetExt:
 24170 00004104 AC                      	LODSB
 24171 00004105 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 24172 00004107 740E                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 24173 00004109 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'
 24174 0000410B 740A                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 24175 0000410D 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'
 24176 0000410F 7503                    	JNZ	short StoExt
 24177 00004111 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 24178                                  StoExt: 
 24179 00004114 AA                      	STOSB
 24180 00004115 EBED                    	JMP	short GetExt
 24181                                  _GetDone:
 24182 00004117 4E                      	DEC	SI
 24183 00004118 88E1                    	MOV	CL,AH  ; ?*!
 24184 0000411A 80C980                  	OR	CL,80H
 24185 0000411D 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of this element
 24186 0000411E 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 24187 0000411F 39FE                    	CMP	SI,DI
 24188 00004121 7503                    	JNZ	short check_device
 24189 00004123 E9EA00                  	JMP	_BADPATH		; NUL parse (two delims most likely)
 24190                                  check_device:
 24191 00004126 56                      	PUSH	SI			; Start of next element
 24192 00004127 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 24193 00004129 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 24194 0000412B 7508                    	JNZ	short NOT_LAST
 24195                                  
 24196                                  ; for last element of the path switch to the correct search attributes
 24197                                  
 24198 0000412D 8A3E[6D05]              	MOV	BH,[SATTRIB]
 24199 00004131 883E[6B05]              	MOV	[ATTRIB],BH
 24200                                  
 24201                                  NOT_LAST:
 24202                                  
 24203                                  ; check name1 to see if we have a device...
 24204                                  
 24205 00004135 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 24206                                  
 24207                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 24208                                  	;context ES
 24209 00004136 16                      	push	ss
 24210 00004137 07                      	pop	es
 24211 00004138 E82E01                  	call	DEVNAME 		; blast BX
 24212 0000413B 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 24213 0000413C 720B                    	JC	short FindFile		; Not a device
 24214 0000413E 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL			; Test next char again
 24215 00004140 7403                    	JZ	short GO_BDEV
 24216 00004142 E9CF00                  	JMP	FILEINPATH		; Device name in middle of path
 24217                                  
 24218                                  GO_BDEV:
 24219 00004145 5E                      	POP	SI			; Points to NUL at end of path
 24220 00004146 E981FE                  	JMP	Build_devJ
 24221                                  
 24222                                  FindFile:
 24223                                  ;;;; 7/28/86
 24224 00004149 803E[4B05]E5            	CMP	BYTE [NAME1],0E5H	; if 1st char = E5
 24225 0000414E 7505                    	JNZ	short NOE5		; no
 24226 00004150 C606[4B05]05            	MOV	BYTE [NAME1],05H	; change it to 05
 24227                                  NOE5:
 24228                                  ;;;; 7/28/86
 24229 00004155 57                      	PUSH	DI			; Start of this element
 24230 00004156 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 24231 00004157 51                      	PUSH	CX			; CL return from NameTrans
 24232                                  ;DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/12/86 F.C.
 24233                                  
 24234 00004158 E89C02                  	CALL	LookupPath		; call fastopen to get dir entry
 24235 0000415B 7303                    	JNC	short DIR_FOUND		; found dir entry
 24236                                  
 24237                                  ;DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/12/86 F.C.
 24238 0000415D E89DFC                  	call	FINDENTRY
 24239                                  DIR_FOUND:
 24240 00004160 59                      	POP	CX
 24241 00004161 07                      	POP	ES
 24242 00004162 5F                      	POP	DI
 24243 00004163 7303                    	JNC	short LOAD_BUF
 24244 00004165 E9D100                  	JMP	BADPATHPOP
 24245                                  
 24246                                  LOAD_BUF:
 24247 00004168 C53E[E205]              	LDS	DI,[CURBUF]
 24248                                  	;test	byte [bx+0Bh],10h
 24249 0000416C F6470B10                	TEST	BYTE [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory
 24250 00004170 7503                    	JNZ	short GO_NEXT 		; DOS 3.3
 24251 00004172 E99F00                  	JMP	FILEINPATH		; Error or end of path
 24252                                  
 24253                                  ; if we are not setting the directory, then check for end of string
 24254                                  
 24255                                  GO_NEXT:
 24256                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24257 00004175 36803E[4C03]00          	CMP	BYTE [SS:NoSetDir],0
 24258 0000417B 7423                    	JZ	short SetDir
 24259 0000417D 89FA                    	MOV	DX,DI			; Save pointer to entry
 24260 0000417F 8CD9                    	MOV	CX,DS
 24261                                  
 24262                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 24263                                  	;context DS
 24264 00004181 16                      	push	ss
 24265 00004182 1F                      	pop	ds
 24266 00004183 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of next element
 24267                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24268                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24269 00004184 F606[3A0D]01            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],FastOpen_Set ;only DOSOPEN can take advantage of
 24270 00004189 740B                    	JZ	short _nofast			; the FastOpen
 24271 0000418B F606[3A0D]02            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],Lookup_Success ; Lookup just happened
 24272 00004190 7404                    	JZ	short _nofast			; no
 24273 00004192 8B3E[660D]              	MOV	DI,[Next_Element_Start]	; no need to insert it again
 24274                                  _nofast:
 24275 00004196 803D00                  	CMP	BYTE [DI],0
 24276                                  	;;JNZ	short NEXT_ONE		; DOS 3.3
 24277                                  	;;JMP	_SETRET  ; retn		; Got it
 24278                                  	;retn	; 05/09/2018
 24279                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24280                                  	;jmp	_SETRET
 24281                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24282 00004199 7421                    	jz	short _SETRET
 24283                                  
 24284                                  NEXT_ONE:
 24285 0000419B 57                      	PUSH	DI			; Put start of next element back on stack
 24286 0000419C 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX
 24287 0000419E 8ED9                    	MOV	DS,CX			; Get back pointer to entry
 24288                                  SetDir:
 24289 000041A0 8B14                    	MOV	DX,[SI] 		; Dir_first
 24290                                  
 24291                                  ;DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/12/86 F.C.
 24292 000041A2 1E                      	PUSH	DS		      ; save [curbuf+2]
 24293                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 24294 000041A3 16                      	push	ss
 24295 000041A4 1F                      	pop	ds		      ; set DS Dosgroup
 24296                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],2
 24297 000041A5 F606[3A0D]02            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],Lookup_Success
 24298 000041AA 7411                    	JZ	short DO_NORMAL	      ; fastopen not in memory or path not
 24299 000041AC 89D3                    	MOV	BX,DX		      ; not found
 24300 000041AE 8B3E[BC05]              	MOV	DI,[CLUSNUM]	      ; clusnum was set in LookupPath
 24301 000041B2 50                      	PUSH	AX		      ; save device id (AH)
 24302 000041B3 E890FD                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 24303 000041B6 58                      	POP	AX		      ; restore device id (AH)
 24304 000041B7 83C402                  	ADD	SP,2		      ; pop ds in stack
 24305 000041BA EB3E                    	JMP	short FAST_OPEN_SKIP
 24306                                  
 24307                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24308                                  _SETRET:
 24309 000041BC C3                      	retn
 24310                                  
 24311                                  DO_NORMAL:
 24312 000041BD 1F                      	POP	DS			; DS = [curbuf + 2]
 24313                                  ;DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/12/86 F.C.
 24314                                  
 24315 000041BE 29FB                    	SUB	BX,DI			; Offset into sector of start of entry
 24316 000041C0 29FE                    	SUB	SI,DI			; Offset into sector of dir_first
 24317 000041C2 53                      	PUSH	BX
 24318 000041C3 50                      	PUSH	AX
 24319 000041C4 56                      	PUSH	SI
 24320 000041C5 51                      	PUSH	CX
 24321                                  	;push	word [di+6]
 24322 000041C6 FF7506                  	PUSH	WORD [DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]	;AN000;>32mb
 24323                                  	; 19/05/2019
 24324                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24325                                  	;push	word [di+8]
 24326 000041C9 FF7508                  	PUSH	WORD [DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]	;AN000;>32mb
 24327 000041CC 89D3                    	MOV	BX,DX
 24328                                  
 24329                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 24330                                  	;context DS
 24331 000041CE 16                      	push	ss
 24332 000041CF 1F                      	pop	ds
 24333                                  	;invoke	SETDIRSRCH		; This uses UNPACK which might blow
 24334 000041D0 E873FD                  	call	SETDIRSRCH		; the entry sector buffer
 24335                                  	; 19/05/2019
 24336                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24337 000041D3 8F06[0706]              	POP	word [HIGH_SECTOR]
 24338 000041D7 5A                      	POP	DX
 24339 000041D8 720A                    	JC	short SKIP_GETB
 24340                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 24341 000041DA C606[4B03]18            	MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL
 24342 000041DF 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL
 24343                                  	;invoke	GETBUFFR		; Get the entry buffer back
 24344 000041E1 E83E18                  	call	GETBUFFR
 24345                                  SKIP_GETB:
 24346 000041E4 59                      	POP	CX
 24347 000041E5 5E                      	POP	SI
 24348 000041E6 58                      	POP	AX
 24349 000041E7 5B                      	POP	BX
 24350 000041E8 7305                    	JNC	short SET_THE_BUF
 24351 000041EA 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of next element
 24352 000041EB 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI			; Point with SI
 24353 000041ED EB21                    	JMP	SHORT _BADPATH
 24354                                  
 24355                                  SET_THE_BUF:
 24356 000041EF E857F5                  	call	SET_BUF_AS_DIR
 24357 000041F2 8B3E[E205]              	MOV	DI,[CURBUF]
 24358 000041F6 01FE                    	ADD	SI,DI			; Get the offsets back
 24359 000041F8 01FB                    	ADD	BX,DI
 24360                                  ; DOS 3.3 FastOpen 6/12/86  F.C.
 24361                                  FAST_OPEN_SKIP:
 24362 000041FA 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of next element
 24363 000041FB E89D02                  	CALL	InsertPath		; insert dir entry info
 24364                                  ; DOS 3.3 FastOpen 6/12/86  F.C.
 24365 000041FE 8A05                    	MOV	AL,[DI]
 24366 00004200 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 24367 00004202 74B8                    	JZ	short _SETRET		; At end
 24368 00004204 47                      	INC	DI			; Skip over "/"
 24369 00004205 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI			; Point with SI
 24370 00004207 E8520F                  	call	PATHCHRCMP
 24371 0000420A 7503                    	JNZ	short find_bad_name	; oops
 24372 0000420C E9A9FE                  	JMP	FINDPATH		; Next element
 24373                                  
 24374                                  find_bad_name:
 24375 0000420F 4E                      	DEC	SI			; Undo above INC to get failure point
 24376                                  _BADPATH:
 24377 00004210 30C9                    	XOR	CL,CL			; Set zero
 24378 00004212 EB2C                    	JMP	SHORT BADPRET
 24379                                  
 24380                                  FILEINPATH:
 24381 00004214 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of next element
 24382                                  
 24383                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 24384                                  	;context DS			; Got to from one place with DS gone
 24385 00004215 16                      	push	ss
 24386 00004216 1F                      	pop	ds
 24387                                  
 24388                                  ; DOS 3.3 FastOpen
 24389                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],1
 24390 00004217 F606[3A0D]01            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],FastOpen_Set  ; do this here is we don't want to
 24391 0000421C 740B                    	JZ	short NO_FAST		; device info to fastopen
 24392                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],2
 24393 0000421E F606[3A0D]02            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],Lookup_Success
 24394 00004223 7404                    	JZ	short NO_FAST
 24395 00004225 8B3E[660D]              	MOV	DI,[Next_Element_Start]  ; This takes care of one time lookup
 24396                                  					 ; success
 24397                                  NO_FAST:
 24398                                  ; DOS 3.3 FastOpen
 24399 00004229 8A05                    	MOV	AL,[DI]
 24400 0000422B 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 24401 0000422D 7404                    	JZ	short INCRET
 24402 0000422F 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI			; Path too long
 24403 00004231 EB0D                    	JMP	SHORT BADPRET
 24404                                  
 24405                                  INCRET:
 24406                                  ; DOS 3.3 FasOpen 6/12/86  F.C.
 24407                                  
 24408 00004233 E86502                  	CALL   InsertPath		; insert dir entry info
 24409                                  
 24410                                  ; DOS 3.3 FasOpen 6/12/86  F.C.
 24411 00004236 FEC0                    	INC	AL			; Reset zero
 24412                                  	; 16/12/2022	
 24413                                  ;_SETRET:
 24414 00004238 C3                      	retn
 24415                                  
 24416                                  BADPATHPOP:
 24417 00004239 5E                      	POP	SI			; Start of next element
 24418 0000423A 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 24419 0000423C 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI			; Start of bad element
 24420 0000423E 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL			; zero if bad element is last, non-zero if path too long
 24421                                  BADPRET:
 24422 00004240 A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 24423 00004243 A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL		; Make sure return correct
 24424 00004246 F9                      	STC
 24425 00004247 C3                      	retn
 24426                                  
 24427                                  ;Break	<STARTSRCH -- INITIATE DIRECTORY SEARCH>
 24428                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24429                                  ;
 24430                                  ; Procedure Name : STARTSRCH
 24431                                  ;
 24432                                  ; Inputs:
 24433                                  ;	[THISDPB] Set
 24434                                  ; Function:
 24435                                  ;	Set up a search for GETENTRY and NEXTENTRY
 24436                                  ; Outputs:
 24437                                  ;	ES:BP = Drive parameters
 24438                                  ;	Sets up LASTENT, ENTFREE=ENTLAST=-1, VOLID=0
 24439                                  ; Destroys ES,BP,AX
 24440                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24441                                  
 24442                                  STARTSRCH:
 24443 00004248 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 24444 0000424C 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 24445 0000424E A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 24446 00004251 A2[7B05]                	MOV	[VOLID],AL		; No volume ID found
 24447 00004254 48                      	DEC	AX
 24448 00004255 A3[D805]                	MOV	[ENTFREE],AX
 24449 00004258 A3[DA05]                	MOV	[ENTLAST],AX
 24450 0000425B C3                      	retn
 24451                                  
 24452                                  ;BREAK <MatchAttributes - the final check for attribute matching>
 24453                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24454                                  ; Procedure Name : MatchAttributes
 24455                                  ;
 24456                                  ; Input:    [Attrib] = attribute to search for
 24457                                  ;	    CH = found attribute
 24458                                  ; Output:   JZ <match>
 24459                                  ;	    JNZ <nomatch>
 24460                                  ; Registers modified: noneski
 24461                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24462                                  
 24463                                  MatchAttributes:
 24464 0000425C 50                      	PUSH	AX
 24465                                  
 24466                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24467 0000425D 36A0[6B05]              	MOV	AL,[ss:ATTRIB]		; AL <- SearchSet
 24468 00004261 F6D0                    	NOT	AL			; AL <- SearchSet'
 24469 00004263 20E8                    	AND	AL,CH			; AL <- SearchSet' and FoundSet
 24470                                  	;and	al,16h
 24471 00004265 2416                    	AND	AL,attr_all	; AL <- SearchSet' and FoundSet and Important
 24472                                  ;
 24473                                  ; the result is non-zero if an attribute is not in the search set
 24474                                  ; and in the found set and in the important set. This means that we do not
 24475                                  ; have a match. Do a JNZ <nomatch> or JZ <match>
 24476                                  ;
 24477 00004267 58                      	POP	AX
 24478 00004268 C3                      	retn

 24486                                  ;Break <DevName - Look for name of device>
 24487                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24488                                  ;
 24489                                  ; Procedure Name : DevName
 24490                                  ;
 24491                                  ; Inputs:
 24492                                  ;	DS,ES:DOSDATA
 24493                                  ;	Filename in NAME1
 24494                                  ;	ATTRIB set so that we can error out if looking for Volume IDs
 24495                                  ; Function:
 24496                                  ;	Determine if file is in list of I/O drivers
 24497                                  ; Outputs:
 24498                                  ;	Carry set if not a device
 24499                                  ;	ELSE
 24500                                  ;	Zero flag set
 24501                                  ;	BH = Bit 7,6 = 1, bit 5 = 0 (cooked mode)
 24502                                  ;	     bits 0-4 set from low byte of attribute word
 24503                                  ;	DEVPT = DWORD pointer to Device header of device
 24504                                  ; BX destroyed, others preserved
 24505                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24506                                  
 24507                                  DEVNAME:

 24535                                  	;;test	word [si+4],8000h
 24536                                  	;TEST	word [SI+SYSDEV.ATT],DEVTYP

 24538 0000428D 89F0                    	MOV	AX,SI
 24539                                  	;add	si,10

 24576                                  ;BREAK <Build_device_ent - Make a Directory entry>
 24577                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24578                                  ; Procedure Name : Build_device_ent
 24579                                  ;
 24580                                  ; Inputs:
 24581                                  ;	[NAME1] has name
 24582                                  ;	BH is attribute field (supplied by DEVNAME)
 24583                                  ;	[DEVPT] points to device header (supplied by DEVNAME)
 24584                                  ; Function:
 24585                                  ;	Build a directory entry for a device at DEVFCB
 24586                                  ; Outputs:
 24587                                  ;	BX points to DEVFCB
 24588                                  ;	SI points to dir_first field
 24589                                  ;	AH = input BH
 24590                                  ;	AL = 0

 24592                                  ;	Zero Set, Carry Clear
 24593                                  ; DS,ES,BP preserved, others destroyed
 24594                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24595                                  
 24596                                  Build_device_ent:
 24597 000042C8 B82020                  	MOV	AX,"  " ; 2020h
 24598                                  
 24599                                  ;hkn; DEVFCB is in DOSDATA

 24601                                  
 24602                                  ;	Fill dir_ext	BUGBUG - use ERRNZs for this stuff!
 24603                                  
 24604 000042CE AB                      	STOSW
 24605 000042CF AA                      	STOSB				; Blank out extent field

 24608                                  
 24609                                  ;	Fill Dir_attr
 24610

 24613 000042D5 B90A00                  	MOV	CX,10
 24614

 24619                                  
 24620                                  ;hkn; DEVFCB is in DOSDATA
 24621 000042DD BF[6105]                	MOV	DI,DEVFCB+dir_entry.dir_time ; 09/08/2018
 24622 000042E0 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 24623                                  
 24624                                  ; Fill dir_time
 24625                                  
 24626 000042E1 AB                      	STOSW
 24627 000042E2 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 24628                                  
 24629                                  ; Fill dir_date
 24630

 24633 000042E6 A1[9A05]                	MOV	AX,[DEVPT]
 24634                                  
 24635                                  ; Fill dir_first
 24636

 24638 000042EA A1[9C05]                	MOV	AX,[DEVPT+2]
 24639                                  ;
 24640                                  ; Fill dir_size_l
 24641                                  ;

 24644

 24814                                  ; 28/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 24815                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - offset 43BDh
 24816                                  
 24817                                  ;Break	<CheckThisDevice - Check for being a device>
 24818                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24819                                  ;
 24820                                  ;   CheckThisDevice - Examine the area at DS:SI to see if there is a valid
 24821                                  ;   device specified. We will return carry if there is a device present. 
 24822                                  ;   The forms of devices we will recognize are:
 24823                                  ;
 24824                                  ;	[path]device
 24825                                  ;
 24826                                  ;   Note that the drive letter has *already* been removed. All other forms
 24827                                  ;   are not considered to be devices. If such a device is found we change
 24828                                  ;   the source pointer to point to the device component.
 24829                                  ;
 24830                                  ;   Inputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 24831                                  ;		DS:SI contains name
 24832                                  ;   Outputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 24833                                  ;		DS:SI point to name or device
 24834                                  ;		Carry flag set if device was found
 24835                                  ;		Carry flag reset otherwise
 24836                                  ;   Registers Modified: all except ES:DI, DS
 24837                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24838                                  
 24839                                  CheckThisDevice:
 24840 000043B2 57                      	push	di
 24841 000043B3 56                      	push	si
 24842 000043B4 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 24843                                  
 24844                                  ; Check for presence of \dev\ (Dam multiplan!)
 24845                                  
 24846 000043B6 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 24847 000043B8 E8A10D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; is it a path char?
 24848 000043BB 7517                    	JNZ	short ParseDev		; no, go attempt to parse device
 24849 000043BD 46                      	INC	SI			; simulate LODSB
 24850                                  
 24851                                  ; We have the leading path separator. Look for DEV part.
 24852                                  
 24853 000043BE AD                      	LODSW
 24854 000043BF 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020h
 24855 000043C2 3D6465                  	cmp	ax,"de"
 24856                                  	;CMP	AX,"e"<< 8 + "d"
 24857 000043C5 752D                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; not "de", assume not device
 24858 000043C7 AC                      	LODSB
 24859 000043C8 0C20                    	OR	AL,20h
 24860 000043CA 3C76                    	CMP	AL,"v"                  ; Not "v", assume not device
 24861 000043CC 7526                    	JNZ	short NotDevice
 24862 000043CE AC                      	LODSB
 24863 000043CF E88A0D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; do we have the last path separator?
 24864 000043D2 7520                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; no. go for it.
 24865                                  
 24866                                  ; DS:SI now points to a potential drive. Preserve them as NameTrans advances
 24867                                  ; SI and DevName may destroy DS.
 24868                                  
 24869                                  ParseDev:
 24870 000043D4 1E                      	push	ds
 24871 000043D5 56                      	push	si			; preserve the source pointer
 24872 000043D6 E8C10C                  	call	NameTrans		; advance DS:SI
 24873 000043D9 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0		; parse entire string?
 24874 000043DC F9                      	STC				; simulate a Carry return from DevName
 24875 000043DD 750B                    	JNZ	short SkipSearch	; no parse. simulate a file return.
 24876                                  
 24877                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 24878 000043DF 16                      	push	ss
 24879 000043E0 1F                      	pop	ds
 24880                                  
 24881                                  ; M026 - start - fix ported from ROMDOS2 for bug # 2849
 24882                                  ;
 24883                                  ; SR;
 24884                                  ; We have to set Attrib before invoking DevName. Otherwise, the value from
 24885                                  ; a previous DOS call is used and DevName thinks it is not a device if the
 24886                                  ; old call set the volume attribute bit.
 24887                                  
 24888 000043E1 A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 24889 000043E4 A2[6B05]                	mov	[ATTRIB],al		;set Attrib for DevName
 24890                                  
 24891                                  ; M026 - end
 24892                                  
 24893 000043E7 E87FFE                  	call	DEVNAME
 24894                                  
 24895                                  SkipSearch:
 24896 000043EA 5E                      	pop	si
 24897 000043EB 1F                      	pop	ds
 24898                                  
 24899                                  ; SI points to the beginning of the potential device. If we have a device
 24900                                  ; then we do not change SI. If we have a file, then we reset SI back to the
 24901                                  ; original value. At this point Carry set indicates FILE.
 24902                                  
 24903                                  CheckReturn:
 24904 000043EC 5F                      	pop	di			; get original SI
 24905 000043ED 7302                    	JNC	short Check_Done	; if device then do not reset pointer
 24906 000043EF 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 24907                                  Check_Done:
 24908 000043F1 5F                      	pop	di
 24909 000043F2 F5                      	CMC				; invert carry. Carry => device
 24910 000043F3 C3                      	retn
 24911                                  NotDevice:
 24912 000043F4 F9                      	STC
 24913 000043F5 EBF5                    	JMP	short CheckReturn
 24914                                  
 24915                                  ;BREAK <LookupPath - call fastopen to get dir entry info>
 24916                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24917                                  ;
 24918                                  ; Procedure Name : LookupPath
 24919                                  ;
 24920                                  ; Output  DS:SI -> path name,
 24921                                  ;	  ES:DI -> dir entry info buffer
 24922                                  ;	  ES:CX -> extended dir info buffer
 24923                                  ;
 24924                                  ;	  carry flag clear : tables pointed by ES:DI and ES:CX are filled by
 24925                                  ;			     FastOpen, DS:SI points to char just one after
 24926                                  ;			     the last char of path name which is fully or
 24927                                  ;			     partially found in FastOPen
 24928                                  ;	  carry flag set : FastOpen not in memory or path name not found
 24929                                  ;
 24930                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24931                                  
 24932                                  LookupPath:
 24933                                  ;	PUSH	AX
 24934

 25165                                  
 25166                                  ;Public DEV001S, DEV001E 		; Pathgen labels
 25167                                  ;DEV001s:
 25168                                  ;		length of packets
 25169 0000451F 160E160D0F0E            LenTab:	 DB	DRDWRHL, DRDNDHL, DRDWRHL, DSTATHL, DFLSHL, DRDNDHL
 25170                                  ;LenTab: db	22,14,22,13,15,14
 25171                                  
 25172                                  ;	Error Function
 25173                                  
 25174                                  CmdTab:
 25175 00004525 8604                    	DB	86h, DEVRD	; 0 input
 25176 00004527 8605                    	DB	86h, DEVRDND	; 1 input status
 25177 00004529 8708                    	DB	87h, DEVWRT	; 2 output
 25178 0000452B 870A                    	DB	87h, DEVOST	; 3 output status
 25179 0000452D 8607                    	DB	86h, DEVIFL	; 4 input flush
 25180 0000452F 8605                    	DB	86h, DEVRDND	; 5 input status with system WAIT
 25181                                  
 25182                                  ; Offset 12BEh of IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3), 1987
 25183                                  
 25184                                  ;CmdTab:
 25185                                  ;	db	86h, 4
 25186                                  ;	db	86h, 5
 25187                                  ;	db	87h, 8

 25193                                  
 25194                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25195                                  ; DOSCODE:8413h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25196                                  
 25197                                  ;Break	<IOFUNC -- DO FUNCTION 1-12 I/O>
 25198                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25199                                  ;
 25200                                  ; Procedure Name : IOFUNC
 25201                                  ;
 25202                                  ; Inputs:
 25203                                  ;	DS:SI Points to SFT
 25204                                  ;	AH is function code
 25205                                  ;		= 0 Input
 25206                                  ;		= 1 Input Status
 25207                                  ;		= 2 Output
 25208                                  ;		= 3 Output Status
 25209                                  ;		= 4 Flush
 25210                                  ;		= 5 Input Status - System WAIT invoked for K09 if no char
 25211                                  ;				   present.
 25212                                  ;	AL = character if output
 25213                                  ; Function:
 25214                                  ;	Perform indicated I/O to device or file
 25215                                  ; Outputs:
 25216                                  ;	AL is character if input
 25217                                  ;	If a status call
 25218                                  ;		zero set if not ready
 25219                                  ;		zero reset if ready (character in AL for input status)
 25220                                  ; For regular files:
 25221                                  ;	Input Status
 25222                                  ;		Gets character but restores position
 25223                                  ;		Zero set on EOF
 25224                                  ;	Input
 25225                                  ;		Gets character advances position
 25226                                  ;		Returns ^Z on EOF
 25227                                  ;	Output Status
 25228                                  ;		Always ready
 25229                                  ; AX altered, all other registers preserved
 25230                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25231                                  
 25232                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25233                                  ; DOSCODE:83D8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25234                                  
 25235                                  IOFUNC:
 25236 00004531 368C16[8C03]            	MOV	[SS:IOXAD+2],SS		; SS override for IOXAD, IOSCNT, 
 25237                                  					; DEVIOBUF

 25258 00004564 8EC3                    	MOV	ES,BX
 25259 00004566 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX

 25261 0000456B 7503                    	jnz	short _no_sys_wait

 25263                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25264 0000456D 80CF04                  	or	bh,04h
 25265                                  	;or	bx,0400H	    ; Set bit 10 in status word for driver
 25266                                  				    ; It is up to device driver to carry out
 25267                                  				    ; appropriate action.

 25269 00004570 891E[7F03]              	MOV	[IOCALL_REQSTAT],BX

 25272                                  
 25273 0000457A 88E3                    	MOV	BL,AH		 	; get function
 25274 0000457C 2E8AA7[1F45]            	MOV	AH,[cs:BX+LenTab]
 25275 00004581 D1E3                    	SHL	BX,1

 25335                                  NO_RETRY:
 25336                                  	; Know user must have wanted Ignore OR Fail. Make sure device shows ready
 25337                                  	; ready so that DOS doesn't get caught in a status loop when user

 25339                                  	;
 25340                                  	; SR; If fail wanted by user set ax to special value (ax = -1). This

 25451                                  ;

 25469                                  ;
 25470                                  ; Inputs:

 25484                                  
 25485                                  	; Main entry for device open and close. AL contains the function 
 25486                                  	; requested. Subtlety: if Sharing is NOT loaded then we do NOT issue 
 25487                                  	; open/close to block devices. This allows networks to function but 
 25488                                  	; does NOT hang up with bogus change-line code.

 25490                                  	;entry	DO_OPCLS

 25493

 25506                                  	; We are about to call device open/close on a block driver. If no

 25518                                  	;MOV	CL,[ES:DI+DPB.DRIVE]	; (cl) = drive
 25519                                  	;;les	di,[es:di+12h] ; MSDOS 3.3
 25520                                  	;les	di,[es:di+13h] ; MSDOS 6.0

 25522                                  GOT_DEV_ADDR:				; ES:DI -> device

 25698                                  ;Break	<SETREAD, SETWRITE -- SET UP HEADER BLOCK>
 25699                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25700                                  ;
 25701                                  ; Procedure Name : SETREAD, SETWRITE
 25702                                  ;
 25703                                  ; Inputs:
 25704                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer Address
 25705                                  ;	CX = Record Count
 25706                                  ;	DX = Starting Record
 25707                                  ;	AH = Media Byte
 25708                                  ;	AL = Unit Code
 25709                                  ; Function:
 25710                                  ;	Set up the device call header at DEVCALL
 25711                                  ; Output:
 25712                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 25713                                  ; No other registers effected
 25714                                  ;
 25715                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25716                                  
 25717                                  SETREAD:
 25718 0000477E 57                      	PUSH	DI
 25719 0000477F 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25720 00004780 50                      	PUSH	AX
 25721 00004781 B104                    	MOV	CL,DEVRD ; mov cl,4
 25722                                  SETCALLHEAD:
 25723 00004783 B016                    	MOV	AL,DRDWRHL ; mov al,16h
 25724 00004785 16                      	PUSH	SS
 25725 00004786 07                      	POP	ES
 25726                                  					; DEVCALL is in DOSDATA
 25727 00004787 BF[5A03]                	MOV	DI,DEVCALL
 25728                                  
 25729 0000478A AA                      	STOSB				; length
 25730 0000478B 58                      	POP	AX			; 
 25731 0000478C AA                      	STOSB				; Unit

 25738 00004797 58                      	POP	AX

 25784                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25785                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25786                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25787                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25788                                  
 25789                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 25790                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25791                                  ;
 25792                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 25793                                  ;
 25794                                  ; Inputs:
 25795                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 25796                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 25797                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 25798                                  ; Function:
 25799                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 25800                                  ; Output:
 25801                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 25802                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 25803                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 25804                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 25805                                  ;
 25806                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25807                                  
 25808                                  RW_SC:
 25809                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 25810                                  	
 25811 000047BD 36833E[7700]00          	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 25812 000047C3 7421                    	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 25813 000047C5 36833E[6C03]01          	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 25814 000047CB 7519                    	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 25815 000047CD 51                      	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 25816 000047CE 52                      	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 25817 000047CF 1E                      	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 25818 000047D0 56                      	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 25819 000047D1 06                      	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 25820 000047D2 57                      	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 25821                                  
 25822 000047D3 368B16[6E03]            	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 25823 000047D8 36803E[5C03]04          	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 25824 000047DE 7408                    	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 25825 000047E0 E8C400                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 25826 000047E3 E98E00                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 25827                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 25828 000047E6 F8                      	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 25829 000047E7 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;LB.

 25885                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>

 25887                                  ;
 25888                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 25889                                  ;
 25890                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 25891                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 25892                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 25893                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 25894                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 25895                                  ; Function:
 25896                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 25897                                  ; Output:
 25898                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 25899                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 25900                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 25901                                  ;
 25902                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 25927                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.

 25944                                  ; Output:

 25957                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.

 26028                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 26029                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26030                                  ;
 26031                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 26032                                  ;
 26033                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 26034                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 26035                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 26036                                  ; Function:
 26037                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 26038                                  ; Output:
 26039                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 26040                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved

 26044                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 26045 00004911 E868FF                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 26046 00004914 7241                    	JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 26047 00004916 B80100                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 26048 00004919 D3E0                    	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 26049 0000491B 368506[B50D]            	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 26050 00004920 7435                    	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 26051                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 26052                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
