 26057 00004933 8EDA                    	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 26058 00004935 89C6                    	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.

 26084                                  ;	TITLE	MKNODE - Node maker
 26085                                  ;	NAME	MKNODE
 26086                                  
 26087                                  ;**	MKNODE.ASM
 26088                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26089                                  ;	Low level routines for making a new local file system node
 26090                                  ;	and filling in an SFT from a directory entry
 26091                                  ;
 26092                                  ;	BUILDDIR
 26093                                  ;	SETDOTENT
 26094                                  ;	MakeNode
 26095                                  ;	NEWENTRY
 26096                                  ;	FREEENT
 26097                                  ;	NEWDIR
 26098                                  ;	DOOPEN
 26099                                  ;	RENAME_MAKE
 26100                                  ;	CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 26101                                  ;
 26102                                  ;	Revision history:
 26103                                  ;
 26104                                  ;	 AN000	version 4.0  Jan. 1988
 26105                                  ;	 A004	PTM 3680  --- Make SFT NAME field offset same as 3.30
 26106                                  
 26107                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 26108                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26109                                  ;
 26110                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 26111                                  ;
 26112                                  ; Inputs:
 26113                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 26114                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 26115                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 26116                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 26117                                  ;               entries
 26118                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 26119                                  ; Function:
 26120                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 26121                                  ; Outputs:
 26122                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 26123                                  ;       ELSE
 26124                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 26125                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 26126                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 26127                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 26128                                  ;
 26129                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26130                                  
 26131                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26132                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26133                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26134                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26135                                  
 26136                                  BUILDDIR:
 26137                                  	; 29/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 26138                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 4E66h
 26139                                  
 26140 00004959 A1[D805]                        MOV     AX,[ENTFREE]
 26141 0000495C 83F8FF                          CMP     AX,-1
 26142 0000495F 7402                            JZ	short CHECK_IF_ROOT
 26143 00004961 F8                              CLC
 26144 00004962 C3                              retn
 26145                                  
 26146                                  CHECK_IF_ROOT:
 26147 00004963 833E[C205]00                    CMP     word [DIRSTART],0
 26148 00004968 7502                            JNZ	short NEWDIR
 26149 0000496A F9                              STC
 26150                                  builddir_retn:
 26151 0000496B C3                              retn				; Can't grow root
 26152                                  
 26153                                  	;entry   NEWDIR
 26154                                  NEWDIR:        
 26155 0000496C 8B1E[C205]              	MOV     BX,[DIRSTART]
 26156 00004970 09DB                            OR      BX,BX
 26157 00004972 7405                            JZ	short NULLDIR
 26158 00004974 E84006                  	call	GETEOF
 26159 00004977 72F2                            jc	short builddir_retn	; Screw up
 26160                                  NULLDIR:
 26161 00004979 B90100                          MOV     CX,1
 26162 0000497C E85105                  	call	ALLOCATE
 26163 0000497F 72EA                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 26164 00004981 8B16[C205]                      MOV     DX,[DIRSTART]
 26165 00004985 09D2                            OR      DX,DX
 26166 00004987 750D                            JNZ	short ADDINGDIR
 26167 00004989 E8BAF5                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 26168 0000498C 72DD                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 26169 0000498E C706[4803]FFFF                  MOV     word [LASTENT],-1
 26170 00004994 EB2B                            JMP     SHORT GOTDIRREC
 26171                                  ADDINGDIR:
 26172 00004996 53                              PUSH    BX
 26173 00004997 8B1E[BC05]                      MOV     BX,[CLUSNUM]
 26174 0000499B E84B0C                          call	IsEOF
 26175 0000499E 5B                              POP     BX
 26176 0000499F 7219                            JB	short NOTFIRSTGROW
 26177                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 26178 000049A1 891E[BC05]                      MOV     [CLUSNUM],BX
 26179 000049A5 51                              PUSH    CX
 26180 000049A6 50                              PUSH    AX
 26181 000049A7 55                              PUSH    BP
 26182 000049A8 B401                            MOV     AH,1			; CLUSNUM update
 26183                                  	; 15/12/2022
 26184 000049AA 268A5600                	mov	dl,[ES:BP] ; 09/09/2018
 26185                                          ; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26186                                  	;;mov	dl,[es:bp+0]
 26187                                  	;MOV	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; drive #
 26188 000049AE 8B0E[C205]                      MOV     CX,[DIRSTART]		; first cluster #
 26189 000049B2 89DD                            MOV     BP,BX 			; CLUSNUM
 26190 000049B4 E8A8DD                  	call	FastOpen_Update
 26191 000049B7 5D                              POP     BP
 26192 000049B8 58                              POP     AX
 26193 000049B9 59                              POP     CX
 26194                                  
 26195                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 26196                                  NOTFIRSTGROW:
 26197 000049BA 89DA                            MOV     DX,BX
 26198 000049BC 30DB                            XOR     BL,BL
 26199 000049BE E8E304                  	call	FIGREC
 26200                                  GOTDIRREC:
 26201                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+4]
 26202 000049C1 268A4E04                        MOV     CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 26203 000049C5 FEC1                            INC     CL
 26204 000049C7 30ED                            XOR     CH,CH
 26205                                  ZERODIR:
 26206 000049C9 51                              PUSH    CX
 26207                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 26208 000049CA C606[4B03]18                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 26209 000049CF B0FF                            MOV     AL,0FFH
 26210 000049D1 E84E10                          call	GETBUFFR
 26211 000049D4 7302                            JNC	short GET_SSIZE
 26212 000049D6 59                              POP     CX
 26213 000049D7 C3                              retn
 26214                                  
 26215                                  GET_SSIZE:
 26216                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 26217 000049D8 268B4E02                        MOV     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 26218 000049DC 06                              PUSH    ES
 26219 000049DD C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 26220                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4
 26221 000049E1 26804D0504                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR
 26222 000049E6 57                              PUSH    DI
 26223                                  	;;add	di,16	; MSDOS 3.3
 26224                                  	;add	di,20	; MSDOS 6.0	
 26225 000049E7 83C714                          ADD     DI,BUFINSIZ
 26226 000049EA 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26227 000049EC D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 26228 000049EE F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 26229 000049F0 7301                            JNC	short EVENZ
 26230 000049F2 AA                              STOSB
 26231                                  EVENZ:
 26232 000049F3 5F                              POP     DI
 26233                                  
 26234                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26235 000049F4 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 26236                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 26237 000049F9 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty7		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 26238 000049FB E82A12                          call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB. 				  ;AN000;
 26239                                          
 26240                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 26241 000049FE 26804D0540              	OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 26242                                  yesdirty7:
 26243 00004A03 07                              POP	ES
 26244 00004A04 59                              POP	CX
 26245                                  
 26246                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26247                                  
 26248                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 26249                                  	;INC	DX
 26250                                  
 26251                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26252 00004A05 83C201                  	add	dx,1
 26253 00004A08 8316[0706]00            	adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 26254                                  
 26255 00004A0D E2BA                            LOOP    ZERODIR
 26256                                  
 26257 00004A0F A1[4803]                        MOV     AX,[LASTENT]
 26258 00004A12 40                              INC     AX
 26259 00004A13 F8                              CLC
 26260 00004A14 C3                              retn
 26261                                  
 26262                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26263                                  ;
 26264                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 26265                                  ;
 26266                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 26267                                  ;
 26268                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 26269                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 26270                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 26271                                  ;
 26272                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26273                                  
 26274                                  SETDOTENT:
 26275                                  ;	Fill in name field
 26276 00004A15 AB                              STOSW
 26277 00004A16 B90400                          MOV     CX,4
 26278 00004A19 B82020                          MOV     AX,"  " ; 2020h
 26279 00004A1C F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 26280 00004A1E AA                              STOSB
 26281                                  
 26282                                  ;	Set up attribute
 26283                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 26284 00004A1F B010                            MOV     AL,attr_directory
 26285 00004A21 AA                              STOSB
 26286                                  
 26287                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 26288 00004A22 83C70A                          ADD     DI,10
 26289 00004A25 8B36[9E05]                      MOV     SI,[THISSFT]
 26290                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 26291 00004A29 8B440D                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 26292 00004A2C AB                              STOSW
 26293                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 26294 00004A2D 8B440F                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 26295 00004A30 AB                      	STOSW
 26296                                  
 26297                                  ;	Set up first cluster field
 26298 00004A31 89D0                            MOV     AX,DX
 26299 00004A33 AB                              STOSW
 26300                                  
 26301                                  ;	0 file size
 26302 00004A34 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26303 00004A36 AB                              STOSW
 26304 00004A37 AB                              STOSW
 26305 00004A38 C3                              retn
 26306                                  
 26307                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 26308                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26309                                  ;
 26310                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 26311                                  ;
 26312                                  ; Inputs:
 26313                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 26314                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 26315                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 26316                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 26317                                  ;
 26318                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 26319                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 26320                                  ;
 26321                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 26322                                  ;               terminated)
 26323                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 26324                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 26325                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 26326                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 26327                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 26328                                  ; Function:
 26329                                  ;       Make a new node
 26330                                  ; Outputs:
 26331                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 26332                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 26333                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 26334                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 26335                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 26336                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 26337                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 26338                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 26339                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 26340                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 26341                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 26342                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 26343                                  ;       ELSE
 26344                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 26345                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 26346                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 26347                                  ;               containing new node.
 26348                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 26349                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 26350                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 26351                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 26352                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 26353                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 26354                                  ;
 26355                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26356                                  
 26357                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26358                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26359                                  
 26360                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26361                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26362                                  
 26363                                  MakeNode:
 26364                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 26365 00004A39 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 26366 00004A3F 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save AH value
 26367 00004A40 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 26368 00004A45 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 26369 00004A48 E861F5                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 26370 00004A4B 88CA                            MOV     DL,CL           ; Save CL info
 26371 00004A4D 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; Device ID to CH
 26372 00004A4F 58                              POP     AX              ; Get back AH
 26373 00004A50 732E                            JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 26374 00004A52 7505                            JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 26375 00004A54 80FA80                          CMP     DL,80h          ; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 26376 00004A57 7406                            JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 26377                                  make_err_4:
 26378 00004A59 B004                            MOV     AL,4            ; case 1 bad path
 26379                                  make_err_ret:
 26380 00004A5B 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 26381 00004A5D F9                              STC
 26382                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 26383 00004A5E C3                              retn
 26384                                  
 26385                                          ;entry	RENAME_MAKE     ; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 26386                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 26387                                  make_type:
 26388                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 26389                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26390                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 26391 00004A5F F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 26392 00004A64 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 26393 00004A66 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 26394                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 26395                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 26396 00004A6B F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 26397 00004A70 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 26398 00004A72 F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 26399 00004A73 B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 26400                                  	; 22/11/2022
 26401                                  make_retn:
 26402                                  	;return
 26403 00004A76 C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 26404                                  
 26405                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 26406                                  
 26407                                  make_type2:
 26408 00004A77 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 26409 00004A7B 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX           ; nothing exists Disk Node
 26410 00004A7D F9                              STC                     ; Not found
 26411 00004A7E EB5A                            JMP     short make_new
 26412                                  
 26413                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 26414                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 26415                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 26416                                  ;   else => file
 26417                                  
 26418                                  make_exists:
 26419 00004A80 7448                            JZ	short make_exists_dir
 26420 00004A82 B003                            MOV     AL,3            ; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 26421                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 26422 00004A84 F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 26423 00004A89 753B                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 26424                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 26425                                                                  ;       if making DIR or Volume ID
 26426 00004A8B 08ED                            OR      CH,CH
 26427 00004A8D 781A                            JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 26428 00004A8F 08E4                            OR      AH,AH
 26429 00004A91 75C8                            JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 26430 00004A93 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save device ID
 26431 00004A94 8E06[E405]                      MOV     ES,[CURBUF+2]
 26432                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 26433 00004A98 268A6F0B                        MOV     CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 26434                                  	;test	ch,1
 26435 00004A9C F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 26436 00004A9F 7524                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files
 26437 00004AA1 E8B8F7                  	call	MatchAttributes
 26438 00004AA4 59                              POP     CX              ; Devid back in CH
 26439 00004AA5 751F                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 26440 00004AA7 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL           ; AL = 0, Disk Node
 26441                                  make_share:
 26442 00004AA9 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 26443 00004AAB 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save Disk or Device node
 26444 00004AAC 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save Device ID
 26445 00004AAD 88EC                            MOV     AH,CH           ; Device ID to AH
 26446 00004AAF E84601                          CALL    DOOPEN          ; Fill in SFT for share check
 26447 00004AB2 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 26448 00004AB6 56                      	push	si
 26449 00004AB7 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 26450 00004AB8 E89629                  	call	ShareEnter
 26451 00004ABB 735A                            jnc	short MakeEndShare
 26452                                  
 26453                                  ; User failed request.
 26454 00004ABD 5B                      	pop	bx
 26455 00004ABE 5E                      	pop	si
 26456 00004ABF 59                      	pop	cx
 26457 00004AC0 58                      	pop	ax
 26458                                  
 26459                                  Make_Share_ret:
 26460 00004AC1 B006                            MOV     AL,6
 26461 00004AC3 EB96                            JMP	short make_err_ret
 26462                                  
 26463                                  make_err_ret_5P:
 26464 00004AC5 59                              POP     CX              ; Get back device ID
 26465                                  make_err_ret_5:
 26466 00004AC6 B005                            MOV     AL,5            ; Attribute mismatch
 26467                                          ; 22/11/2022
 26468 00004AC8 EB91                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 26469                                  
 26470                                  make_exists_dir:
 26471 00004ACA B001                            MOV     AL,1            ; exists as directory, always an error
 26472                                  	; 22/11/2022
 26473 00004ACC EB8D                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 26474                                  
 26475                                  make_save:
 26476 00004ACE 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save whether Disk or File
 26477 00004ACF 89C8                            MOV     AX,CX           ; Device ID to AH
 26478 00004AD1 E87400                          CALL    NEWENTRY
 26479 00004AD4 58                              POP     AX              ; 0 if Disk, 3 if File
 26480 00004AD5 739F                            jnc	short make_retn
 26481 00004AD7 B002                            MOV     AL,2            ; create failed case 2
 26482                                  make_save_retn:
 26483 00004AD9 C3                              retn
 26484                                  
 26485                                  make_new:
 26486 00004ADA E8F1FF                          call    make_save
 26487 00004ADD 72FA                            jc	short make_save_retn	; case 2 fail
 26488                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],10h
 26489 00004ADF F606[6B05]10            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_directory
 26490 00004AE4 75F3                            jnz	short make_save_retn	; Don't "open" directories,
 26491                                  					; so don't tell the sharer about them
 26492 00004AE6 50                      	push	ax
 26493 00004AE7 53                      	push	bx
 26494 00004AE8 56                      	push	si		
 26495 00004AE9 E86529                          call	ShareEnter
 26496 00004AEC 5E                      	pop	si
 26497 00004AED 5B                      	pop	bx
 26498 00004AEE 58                      	pop	ax
 26499 00004AEF 73E8                    	jnc	short make_save_retn
 26500                                  
 26501                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 26502                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 26503                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 26504                                  
 26505 00004AF1 50                              PUSH    AX
 26506 00004AF2 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 26507                                  	;mov	byte [es:bx],0E5h
 26508 00004AF6 26C607E5                	MOV	BYTE [ES:BX],DIRFREE	; nuke newly created entry.
 26509                                  	
 26510                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26511                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h
 26512 00004AFA 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 26513                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 26514 00004AFF 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty8		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 26515                                  	; 22/11/2022
 26516 00004B01 E82411                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 26517                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 26518 00004B04 26804D0540                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ; flag buffer as dirty
 26519                                  yesdirty8:
 26520 00004B09 C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 26521                                  	; 15/12/2022
 26522 00004B0D 268A4600                        mov	al,[ES:BP]
 26523                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26524                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 26525                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive for flush
 26526 00004B11 E80C10                          call	FLUSHBUF		; write out buffer.
 26527 00004B14 58                              POP     AX
 26528 00004B15 EBAA                            jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 26529                                  
 26530                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 26531                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 26532                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 26533                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 26534                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 26535                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 26536                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 26537                                  ;
 26538                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 26539                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 26540                                  
 26541                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26542                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26543                                  
 26544                                  MakeEndShare:
 26545 00004B17 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]		; grab SFT
 26546 00004B1B 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26547 00004B1D E868C8                  	call	ECritSFT
 26548 00004B20 268705                  	xchg	AX,[ES:DI]
 26549                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 26550 00004B23 50                      	push	ax
 26551 00004B24 57                      	push	di
 26552 00004B25 06                      	push	es
 26553 00004B26 9C                              PUSHF
 26554 00004B27 E82229                          call	ShareEnd                ; remove sharing
 26555 00004B2A 9D                              POPF
 26556 00004B2B 07                      	pop	es
 26557 00004B2C 5F                      	pop	di
 26558 00004B2D 268F05                          pop	word [ES:DI]	
 26559                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 26560 00004B30 E870C8                  	call	LCritSFT
 26561                                  	; 22/11/2022
 26562                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26563 00004B33 5B                      	pop	bx
 26564 00004B34 5E                      	pop	si
 26565 00004B35 59                      	pop	cx
 26566 00004B36 58                      	pop	ax
 26567 00004B37 E894FF                          CALL    make_save
 26568                                  
 26569                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 26570                                  
 26571 00004B3A 729D                            jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error
 26572 00004B3C 50                      	push	ax
 26573 00004B3D 53                      	push	bx
 26574 00004B3E 56                      	push	si
 26575 00004B3F 9C                              PUSHF
 26576 00004B40 E80E29                          call	ShareEnter
 26577 00004B43 9D                              POPF
 26578 00004B44 5E                      	pop	si
 26579 00004B45 5B                      	pop	bx
 26580 00004B46 58                      	pop	ax
 26581                                  
 26582                                  ; If Share_check fails, then we have an internal ERROR!!!!!
 26583                                  
 26584                                  makeendshare_retn:
 26585 00004B47 C3                              retn
 26586                                  
 26587                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26588                                  ;
 26589                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 26590                                  ;
 26591                                  ; Inputs:
 26592                                  ;       [THISSFT] set
 26593                                  ;       [THISDPB] set
 26594                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 26595                                  ;               entries
 26596                                  ;       [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 26597                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 26598                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 26599                                  ;       CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 26600                                  ;               NC means file existed (device)
 26601                                  ;               C  means file did not exist
 26602                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 26603                                  ;       If FILE
 26604                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 26605                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 26606                                  ;       If device
 26607                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 26608                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 26609                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 26610                                  ; Function:
 26611                                  ;       Make a new directory entry
 26612                                  ;       If an old one existed it is truncated first
 26613                                  ; Outputs:
 26614                                  ;       Carry set if error
 26615                                  ;               Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 26616                                  ;               vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 26617                                  ;       else
 26618                                  ;               outputs of DOOPEN
 26619                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 26620                                  ;
 26621                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26622                                  
 26623                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26624                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26625                                  
 26626                                  NEWENTRY:
 26627 00004B48 C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 26628 00004B4C 7316                            JNC	short EXISTENT	
 26629 00004B4E 803E[4A03]00                    CMP     byte [FAILERR],0
 26630 00004B53 F9                              STC
 26631 00004B54 75F1                            jnz	short makeendshare_retn	; User FAILed, node might exist
 26632 00004B56 E800FE                          CALL    BUILDDIR        ; Try to build dir
 26633 00004B59 72EC                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 26634 00004B5B E8BAF3                          call	GETENT          ; Point at that free entry
 26635 00004B5E 72E7                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 26636 00004B60 EB0E                            JMP     SHORT FREESPOT
 26637                                  
 26638                                  ERRRET3:
 26639 00004B62 F9                              STC
 26640                                  newentry_retn:
 26641 00004B63 C3                              retn
 26642                                  
 26643                                  EXISTENT:
 26644 00004B64 08E4                            OR      AH,AH           ; Check if file is I/O device
 26645 00004B66 7903                            JNS	short NOT_DEV1
 26646 00004B68 E98D00                          JMP     DOOPEN          ; If so, proceed with open
 26647                                  
 26648                                  NOT_DEV1:
 26649 00004B6B E82C01                          call	FREEENT		; Free cluster chain
 26650 00004B6E 72F3                            jc	short newentry_retn ; Failed
 26651                                  FREESPOT:
 26652                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],8
 26653 00004B70 F606[6B05]08            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id
 26654 00004B75 7407                            JZ	short NOTVOLID
 26655 00004B77 803E[7B05]00                    CMP     BYTE [VOLID],0
 26656 00004B7C 75E4                            JNZ	short ERRRET3	; Can't create a second volume ID
 26657                                  NOTVOLID:
 26658 00004B7E 8E06[E405]                      MOV     ES,[CURBUF+2]
 26659 00004B82 89DF                            MOV     DI,BX
 26660                                  
 26661 00004B84 BE[4B05]                        MOV     SI,NAME1
 26662                                  
 26663 00004B87 B90500                          MOV     CX,5
 26664 00004B8A F3A5                            REP     MOVSW
 26665 00004B8C A4                              MOVSB                   ; Move name into dir entry
 26666 00004B8D A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 26667 00004B90 AA                      	STOSB                   ; Attributes
 26668                                  
 26669                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 26670 00004B91 B105                            MOV     CL,5            ;FT. assume normal FBUGBUG	;AN000;
 26671                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 26672                                  
 26673 00004B93 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26674 00004B95 F3AB                            REP     STOSW           ; Zero pad
 26675 00004B97 E8ACBF                          call	DATE16
 26676 00004B9A 92                              XCHG    AX,DX
 26677 00004B9B AB                              STOSW                   ; dir_time
 26678 00004B9C 92                              XCHG    AX,DX
 26679 00004B9D AB                              STOSW                   ; dir_date
 26680 00004B9E 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26681 00004BA0 57                              PUSH    DI              ; Correct SI input value
 26682                                  				; 	(recomputed for new buffer)
 26683 00004BA1 AB                              STOSW                   ; Zero dir_first and size
 26684 00004BA2 AB                              STOSW
 26685 00004BA3 AB                              STOSW
 26686                                  updnxt:
 26687 00004BA4 8B36[E205]              	MOV	SI,[CURBUF]
 26688                                  
 26689                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26690                                  
 26691                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26692 00004BA8 26F6440540              	TEST	byte [ES:SI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 26693                                  				;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;

 26699                                  yesdirty9:

 26701                                  	; 15/12/2022

 26703                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)

 26706 00004BBF 50                              PUSH    AX
 26707 00004BC0 53                              PUSH    BX
 26708                                  
 26709                                  ; If we have a file, we need to increment the open ref. count so that
 26710                                  ; we have some protection against invalid media changes if an Int 24
 26711                                  ; error occurs.
 26712                                  ; Do nothing for a device.

 26736

 26739 00004BF0 5B                              POP     BX

 26742 00004BF3 88C4                            MOV     AH,AL           ; Get I/O driver number back
 26743 00004BF5 7301                    	jnc	short DOOPEN    ; Failed
 26744 00004BF7 C3                      	retn

 26747                                  
 26748                                  ; DOSCODE:8AE4h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26749                                  
 26750                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26751                                  ; DOSCODE:8AA9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26752                                  
 26753                                  ; DOOPEN
 26754                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26755                                  ;
 26756                                  ; Inputs:
 26757                                  ;       [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 26758                                  ;       [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 26759                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 26760                                  ;       If FILE
 26761                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 26762                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 26763                                  ;       If device
 26764                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 26765                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 26766                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 26767                                  ; Function:
 26768                                  ;       Fill in SFT from dir entry
 26769                                  ; Outputs:
 26770                                  ;       CARRY CLEAR
 26771                                  ;       sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 26772                                  ;       sf_flags high byte = 0
 26773                                  ;       sf_flags low byte = AH except
 26774                                  ;       sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 26775                                  ;       sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 26776                                  ;       sf_position = 0
 26777                                  ;       If device
 26778                                  ;           sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 26779                                  ;           sf_size = 0
 26780                                  ;       If file
 26781                                  ;           sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 26782                                  ;           sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 26783                                  ;           sf_cluspos = 0
 26784                                  ;           sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 26785                                  ;           sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 26786                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 26787                                  ;
 26788                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26789                                  
 26790                                  	;entry	DOOPEN
 26791                                  DOOPEN:
 26792                                  ;	Generate and store attribute
 26793                                  
 26794 00004BF8 88E6                            MOV     DH,AH           ; AH to different place
 26795 00004BFA C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 26796                                  	;add	di,4
 26797 00004BFE 83C704                          ADD     DI,SF_ENTRY.sf_attr ; Skip ref_count and mode fields
 26798 00004C01 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL           ; Assume it's a device, devices have an
 26799                                                                  ;   attribute of 0 (for R/O testing etc).
 26800 00004C03 08F6                            OR      DH,DH           ; See if our assumption good.
 26801 00004C05 7807                            JS	short DEV_SFT1	; If device DS=DOSGROUP
 26802 00004C07 8E1E[E405]                      MOV     DS,[CURBUF+2]
 26803                                  	;mov	al,[BX+0Bh]
 26804 00004C0B 8A470B                          MOV     AL,[BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 26805                                  				; If file, get attrib from dir entry
 26806                                  DEV_SFT1:
 26807 00004C0E AA                              STOSB                   ; sf_attr, ES:DI -> sf_flags
 26808                                  
 26809                                  ;	Generate and store flags word
 26810                                  
 26811 00004C0F 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26812 00004C11 88F0                            MOV     AL,DH
 26813                                  	;or	al,40h
 26814 00004C13 0C40                            OR      AL,devid_file_clean
 26815 00004C15 AB                              STOSW                   ; sf_flags, ES:DI -> sf_devptr
 26816                                  
 26817                                  ;	Generate and store device pointer
 26818                                  
 26819 00004C16 1E                              PUSH    DS
 26820                                  	;lds	ax,[bx+1Ah]
 26821 00004C17 C5471A                          LDS     AX,[BX+dir_entry.dir_first] ; Assume device
 26822 00004C1A 08F6                            OR      DH,DH
 26823 00004C1C 7805                            JS	short DEV_SFT2
 26824                                  
 26825                                  ;hkn; SS override
 26826 00004C1E 36C506[8A05]                    LDS     AX,[SS:THISDPB]	; Was file
 26827                                  DEV_SFT2:
 26828 00004C23 AB                              STOSW 			; store offset
 26829 00004C24 8CD8                            MOV     AX,DS
 26830 00004C26 1F                              POP     DS
 26831 00004C27 AB                      	STOSW			; store segment
 26832                                  				; ES:DI -> sf_firclus
 26833                                  
 26834                                  ;	Generate pointer to, generate and store first cluster 
 26835                                  ;	(irrelevant for devices)
 26836                                  
 26837 00004C28 56                              PUSH    SI              ; Save pointer to dir_first
 26838 00004C29 A5                              MOVSW                   ; dir_first -> sf_firclus
 26839                                                                  ; DS:SI -> dir_size_l, ES:DI -> sf_time
 26840                                  
 26841                                  ;	Copy time/date of last modification
 26842                                  
 26843                                  	;sub	si,6
 26844 00004C2A 83EE06                          SUB     SI,dir_entry.dir_size_l - dir_entry.dir_time 
 26845                                  				; DS:SI->dir_time
 26846 00004C2D A5                              MOVSW                   ; dir_time -> sf_time
 26847                                                                  ; DS:SI -> dir_date, ES:DI -> sf_date
 26848 00004C2E A5                              MOVSW                   ; dir_date -> sf_date
 26849                                                                  ; DS:SI -> dir_first, ES:DI -> sf_size
 26850                                  
 26851                                  ;	Generate and store file size (0 for devices)
 26852                                  
 26853 00004C2F AD                              LODSW                   ; skip dir_first, DS:SI -> dir_size_l
 26854 00004C30 AD                              LODSW                   ; dir_size_l in AX , DS:SI -> dir_size_h
 26855 00004C31 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; dir_size_l in CX
 26856 00004C33 AD                              LODSW                   ; dir_size_h (size AX:CX), DS:SI -> ????
 26857 00004C34 08F6                            OR      DH,DH
 26858 00004C36 7904                            JNS	short FILE_SFT1
 26859 00004C38 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26860 00004C3A 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; Devices are open ended
 26861                                  FILE_SFT1:
 26862 00004C3C 91                              XCHG    AX,CX
 26863 00004C3D AB                              STOSW                   ; Low word of sf_size
 26864 00004C3E 91                              XCHG    AX,CX
 26865 00004C3F AB                              STOSW                   ; High word of sf_size
 26866                                                                  ; ES:DI -> sf_position
 26867                                  ; Initialize position to 0
 26868                                  
 26869 00004C40 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26870 00004C42 AB                              STOSW

 26872                                                                  ; ES:DI -> sf_cluspos

 26879                                  	;mov	ax,[bx+1Ah]

 26976                                  ;
 26977                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 26978                                  ;
 26979                                  ; Inputs:
 26980                                  ;       ES:BP -> DPB
 26981                                  ;       [CURBUF] Set
 26982                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 26983                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 26984                                  ; Function:
 26985                                  ;       Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 26986                                  ; Outputs:
 26987                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 26988                                  ;       (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 26989                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 26990                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26991                                  
 26992                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26993                                  FREEENT:
 26994 00004C9A 1E                              PUSH    DS
 26995 00004C9B C53E[E205]                      LDS     DI,[CURBUF]
 26996 00004C9F 8B0C                            MOV     CX,[SI]         ; Get pointer to clusters
 26997                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26998                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26999 00004CA1 8B5508                  	MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]  ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27000                                  ;hkn; SS override
 27001 00004CA4 368916[0706]                    MOV	[SS:HIGH_SECTOR],DX		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27002 00004CA9 8B5506                          MOV     DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27003 00004CAC 1F                              POP     DS
 27004 00004CAD 83F902                  	CMP	CX,2
 27005 00004CB0 7235                            JB	short RET1	; Was 0 length file (or mucked Firclus if CX=1)
 27006                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 27007 00004CB2 263B4E0D                        CMP     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 27008 00004CB6 772F                            JA	short RET1	; Treat like zero length file (firclus mucked)
 27009 00004CB8 29FB                            SUB     BX,DI
 27010 00004CBA 53                              PUSH    BX              ; Save offset
 27011 00004CBB FF36[0706]              	PUSH	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27012 00004CBF 52                              PUSH    DX              ; Save sector number
 27013 00004CC0 89CB                            MOV     BX,CX
 27014 00004CC2 E8B702                          call	RELEASE         ; Free any data allocated
 27015 00004CC5 5A                              POP     DX
 27016 00004CC6 8F06[0706]                      POP	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27017 00004CCA 7302                            JNC	short GET_BUF_BACK
 27018 00004CCC 5B                              POP     BX
 27019                                  freeent_retn:
 27020 00004CCD C3                              retn			; Screw up
 27021                                  
 27022                                  GET_BUF_BACK:
 27023                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 27024 00004CCE C606[4B03]18                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL
 27025 00004CD3 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL
 27026 00004CD5 E84A0D                  	call	GETBUFFR        ; Get sector back
 27027 00004CD8 5B                              POP     BX              ; Get offset back
 27028 00004CD9 72F2                            jc	short freeent_retn
 27029 00004CDB E86BEA                  	call	SET_BUF_AS_DIR

 27038                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27039                                  ;
 27040                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 27041                                  ;
 27042                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 27043                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 27044                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 27045                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 27046                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 27047                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 27048                                  ;
 27049                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27050                                  
 27051                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 27052 00004CE9 50                      	PUSH    AX
 27053 00004CEA 9F                              lahf                    ; preserve flags
 27054 00004CEB 803E[A20A]00                    CMP     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 27055 00004CF0 7410                            JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 27056 00004CF2 C606[A20A]00                    mov     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0	; reset flag
 27057 00004CF7 06                      	push	es
 27058 00004CF8 57                      	push	di
 27059 00004CF9 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 27060 00004CFD E88CF9                          call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 27061 00004D00 5F                      	pop	di
 27062 00004D01 07                      	pop	es
 27063                                  
 27064                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 27065 00004D02 9E                              sahf                    ; restore flags
 27066 00004D03 58                              POP     AX
 27067 00004D04 C3                              retn

 27078                                  ;**	Misc Low level routines for doing simple FCB computations, Cache
 27079                                  ;       reads and writes, I/O optimization, and FAT allocation/deallocation

 27100                                  ;Break   <FNDCLUS -- Skip over allocation units>
 27101                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27102                                  ;
 27103                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 27104                                  ;
 27105                                  ; Inputs:
 27106                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters to skip
 27107                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 27108                                  ;       [THISSFT] point to SFT
 27109                                  ; Outputs:
 27110                                  ;       BX = Last cluster skipped to
 27111                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters remaining (0 unless EOF)
 27112                                  ;       DX = Position of last cluster
 27113                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 27114                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 27115                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27116                                  
 27117                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27118                                  ; DOSCODE:8BF2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27119                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27120                                  ; DOSCODE:8BB7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27121                                  
 27122                                  FNDCLUS:
 27123 00004D05 06                      	PUSH	ES
 27124 00004D06 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]		; setup addressability to SFT
 27125                                  	;;mov	bx,[es:di+1Bh] ; MSDOS 3.3
 27126                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+35h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 27127 00004D0A 268B5D35                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_lstclus]
 27128                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+19h]
 27129 00004D0E 268B5519                        MOV     DX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_cluspos]
 27130 00004D12 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX
 27131 00004D14 7424                    	JZ	short NOCLUS
 27132                                  
 27133 00004D16 29D1                            SUB     CX,DX
 27134 00004D18 7308                            JNB	short FINDIT
 27135                                  
 27136 00004D1A 01D1                            ADD     CX,DX
 27137 00004D1C 31D2                            XOR     DX,DX
 27138                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+0Bh]
 27139 00004D1E 268B5D0B                        MOV     BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_firclus]
 27140                                  FINDIT:
 27141 00004D22 07                              POP	ES
 27142 00004D23 E313                    	JCXZ	RET9
 27143                                  
 27144                                  	;entry	SKPCLP
 27145                                  SKPCLP:
 27146 00004D25 E8D808                  	call	UNPACK
 27147 00004D28 7214                            jc	short fndclus_retn	; retc
 27148                                  
 27149                                  	; 09/09/2018
 27150                                  
 27151                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 27152                                  	;push	bx
 27153                                  	;mov	bx,di
 27154                                  	;call	IsEOF
 27155                                  	;pop	bx	
 27156                                  	;jae	short RET9

 27159

 27182                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 27183                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27184                                  ;
 27185                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 27186                                  ;
 27187                                  ; Inputs:
 27188                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 27189                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 27190                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 27191                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 27192                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 27193                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 27194                                  ; Function:
 27195                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 27196                                  ;       read if necessary.
 27197                                  ; Outputs:
 27198                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 27199                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 27200                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 27201                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 27202                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 27203                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 27204                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27205                                  
 27206                                  BUFSEC:
 27207 00004D3F 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 27208 00004D43 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]

 27210 00004D47 C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE

 27212 00004D4F E8D00C                  	call	GETBUFFR

 27214

 27216 00004D59 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 27217 00004D5D 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 27218 00004D5F 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]

 27220 00004D65 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI

 27223 00004D6D 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA

 27235                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 27236                                  ;

 27238                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 27239                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 27240                                  ;

 27242                                  ;
 27243                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27244

 27446 00004E32 720F                            JC	short NONEXT
 27447                                  clusgot:
