 37768                                  
 37769                                  ;BREAK <SkipBack - move backwards to a path separator>
 37770                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37771                                  ;   SkipBack - look at ES:DI and backup until it points to a / ;   Inputs:     ES:DI - point to a char
 37773                                  ;               BX has current directory back up limit (point to a / \)
 37774                                  ;   Outputs:    ES:DI backed up to point to a path char
 37775                                  ;               AL has char from output ES:DI (path sep if carry clear)
 37776                                  ;               Carry set if illegal backup
 37777                                  ;               Carry Clear if ok

 37783 00006E2E 720B                    	JB	short SkipBad		;       if (d < dlim)
 37784 00006E30 4F                      	DEC     DI                      ;           goto err;

 37786 00006E34 E825E3                  	call    PATHCHRCMP              ;           break;
 37787 00006E37 75F3                    	JNZ	short SkipBack		;       }
 37788 00006E39 F8                      	CLC                             ;   return (0);
 37789 00006E3A C3                      	retn				;
 37790                                  SkipBad:                                ;err:
 37791                                  	;mov	al,3

 37794 00006E3E C3                      	retn				;
 37795                                  
 37796                                  ;Break <CopyComponent - copy out a file path component>
 37797                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37798                                  ;   CopyComponent - copy a file component from a path string (DS:SI) into ES:DI
 37799                                  ;
 37800                                  ;   Inputs:     DS:SI - source path
 37801                                  ;               ES:DI - destination
 37802                                  ;               ES:BP - end of buffer
 37803                                  ;   Outputs:    Carry Set - too long
 37804                                  ;               Carry Clear - DS:SI moved past component
 37805                                  ;                   CX has length of destination

 37808

 37811                                  CopyComponent:
 37812                                  
 37813                                  %define CopyBP	 [BP]		; word

 37843 00006E63 AA                      	STOSB

 37848 00006E6C E82BE2                  	call	NameTrans               ;       s = NameTrans (s, Name1);

 37861 00006E8F 16                      	push	ss

 37867 00006E9B 5F                      	pop	di

 37869 00006E9F 49                      	DEC     CX
 37870 00006EA0 034E02                  	ADD     CX,CopyDoff ; [bp+2]

 37912                                  ;Break <Splice - pseudo mount by string substitution>
 37913                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37914                                  ;   Splice - take a string and substitute a prefix if one exists. Change
 37915                                  ;       ThisCDS to point to physical drive CDS.
 37916                                  ;   Inputs:     DS:SI point to string
 37917                                  ;               NoSetDir = TRUE => exact matches with splice fail
 37918                                  ;   Outputs:    DS:SI points to thisCDS
 37919                                  ;               ES:DI points to DPB
 37920                                  ;               String at DS:SI may be reduced in length by removing prefix
 37921                                  ;               and substituting drive letter.
 37922                                  ;               CX = 0 If no splice done
 37923                                  ;               CX <> 0 otherwise
 37924                                  ;               ThisCDS points to proper CDS if spliced, otherwise it is
 37925                                  ;                   left alone
 37926                                  ;               ThisDPB points to proper DPB
 37927                                  ;   Registers modified: DS:SI, ES:DI, BX,AX,CX
 37928                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37929                                  
 37930                                  Splice:

 37934 00006EDA 36FF36[A405]            	push	word [SS:THISCDS+2]	; TmpCDS = ThisCDS;smr;SS Override

 37936 00006EE0 56                      	push	si

 37947                                  	;;test	word [si+67],2000h
 37948                                  	;TEST	word [SI+curdir.flags],curdir_splice
 37949 00006EF0 74F3                    	JZ	short SpliceScan 	;       if ( Spliced (i) ) {
 37950 00006EF2 57                      	push	di
 37951 00006EF3 E8A100                  	CALL    PathPref                ;           if (!PathPref (s, d))
 37952 00006EF6 7403                    	JZ	short SpliceFound	;
 37953                                  SpliceSkip:
 37954 00006EF8 5F                      	pop	di
 37955 00006EF9 EBEA                    	JMP	short SpliceScan	;               continue;
 37956                                  SpliceFound:
 37957 00006EFB 26803D00                	CMP     BYTE [ES:DI],0		;           if (*s || NoSetDir) {
 37958 00006EFF 7508                    	JNZ	short SpliceDo
 37959 00006F01 36F606[4C03]FF          	TEST	byte [ss:NoSetDir],-1			;smr;SS Override
 37960 00006F07 75EF                    	JNZ	short SpliceSkip
 37961                                  SpliceDo:
 37962 00006F09 89FE                    	MOV     SI,DI                   ;               p = src + strlen (p);
 37963 00006F0B 06                      	push	es
 37964 00006F0C 1F                      	pop	ds
 37965 00006F0D 5F                      	pop	di
 37966 00006F0E E88000                  	CALL	TextFromDrive1          ;               src = TextFromDrive1(src,i);
 37967 00006F11 36A1[B605]              	MOV     AX,[SS:CURR_DIR_END]			;smr;SS Override
 37968 00006F15 09C0                    	OR      AX,AX
 37969 00006F17 7808                    	JS	short NoPoke
 37970 00006F19 01F8                    	ADD     AX,DI                   ;               curdirend += src-p;
 37971 00006F1B 29F0                    	SUB     AX,SI
 37972 00006F1D 36A3[B605]              	MOV     [SS:CURR_DIR_END],AX			;smr;SS Override
 37973                                  NoPoke:
 37974 00006F21 803C00                  	CMP     BYTE [SI],0		;               if (*p)
 37975 00006F24 7503                    	JNZ	short SpliceCopy	;                   *src++ = '\\';
 37976 00006F26 B05C                    	MOV     AL,"\"
 37977 00006F28 AA                      	STOSB
 37978                                  SpliceCopy:                             ;               strcpy (src, p);
 37979 00006F29 E82EA3                  	call	FStrCpy
 37980 00006F2C 83C404                  	ADD     SP,4                    ; throw away saved stuff
 37981 00006F2F 80C901                  	OR      CL,1                    ; signal splice done.
 37982 00006F32 EB0C                    	JMP     SHORT DoSet             ;               return;
 37983                                  SpliceDone:                             ;               }
 37984 00006F34 368F06[A405]            	pop	word [SS:THISCDS+2]     ;   ThisCDS = TmpCDS;
 37985 00006F39 368F06[A205]            	pop	word [SS:THISCDS]			;smr;SS Override
 37986                                  AllDone:
 37987 00006F3E 31C9                    	XOR     CX,CX
 37988                                  DoSet:
 37989 00006F40 36C536[A205]            	LDS     SI,[SS:THISCDS]		;   ThisDPB = ThisCDS->devptr;;smr;SS Override
 37990                                  	;les	di,[si+69]
 37991 00006F45 C47C45                  	LES     DI,[SI+curdir.devptr]

 37994                                  Splice_retn:

 38003                                  ;Break <$NameTrans - partially process a name>
 38004                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38005                                  ;   $NameTrans - allow users to see what names get mapped to. This call
 38006                                  ;   performs only string substitution and canonicalization, not splicing.  Due
 38007                                  ;   to Transpath playing games with devices, we need to insure that the output
 38008                                  ;   has drive letter and : in it.
 38009                                  ;
 38010                                  ;   Inputs:     DS:SI - source string for translation
 38011                                  ;               ES:DI - pointer to buffer
 38012                                  ;   Outputs:
 38013                                  ;       Carry Clear
 38014                                  ;               Buffer at ES:DI is filled in with data
 38015                                  ;               ES:DI point byte after nul byte at end of dest string in buffer
 38016                                  ;       Carry Set
 38017                                  ;               AX = error_path_not_found
 38018                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 38019                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38020                                  
 38021                                  _$NameTrans:
 38022 00006F53 1E                      	push	ds
 38023 00006F54 56                      	push	si
 38024 00006F55 06                      	push	es
 38025 00006F56 57                      	push	di
 38026 00006F57 51                      	push	cx ; MSDOS 6.0
 38027                                  	
 38028                                  	; MSDOS 6.0	
 38029                                  ; M027 - Start
 38030                                  ;
 38031                                  ; Sattrib must be set up with default values here. Otherwise, the value from
 38032                                  ; a previous DOS call is used for attrib and DevName thinks it is not a 
 38033                                  ; device if the old call set the volume attribute bit. Note that devname in
 38034                                  ; dir2.asm gets ultimately called by Transpath. See also M026. Also save
 38035                                  ; and restore CX.
 38036                                  
 38037                                  	;mov	ch,16h
 38038 00006F58 B516                    	mov     ch,attr_hidden+attr_system+attr_directory
 38039 00006F5A E8BA02                  	call	SetAttrib
 38040

 38042                                  
 38043                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 38044 00006F5D BF[BE03]                	MOV     DI,OPENBUF
 38045 00006F60 E8E6FC                  	CALL    TransPath               ; to translation (everything)
 38046 00006F63 59                      	pop	cx ; MSDOS 6.0
 38047 00006F64 5F                      	pop     di
 38048 00006F65 07                      	pop	es
 38049 00006F66 5E                      	pop     si
 38050 00006F67 1F                      	pop     ds
 38051 00006F68 7303                    	JNC	short TransOK
 38052 00006F6A E92097                  	jmp	SYS_RET_ERR
 38053                                  TransOK:

 38055 00006F70 16                      	push	ss

 38061                                  ;Break   <DriveFromText - return drive number from a text string>
 38062                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38063                                  ;   DriveFromText - examine DS:SI and remove a drive letter, advancing the
 38064                                  ;   pointer.
 38065                                  ;
 38066                                  ;   Inputs:     DS:SI point to a text string
 38067                                  ;   Outputs:    AL has drive number
 38068                                  ;               DS:SI advanced

 38075 00006F7D 74D3                    	jz	short Splice_retn

 38077 00006F83 75CD                    	jnz	short Splice_retn
 38078 00006F85 AD                      	LODSW                           ;           drive = (*s | 020) - 'a'+1;

 38081 00006F88 2C60                    	SUB     AL,'a'-1                ;           s += 2;
 38082 00006F8A 75C6                    	jnz	short Splice_retn
 38083 00006F8C B0FF                    	MOV     AL,-1                   ; nuke AL...
 38084 00006F8E C3                      	retn				;           }
 38085                                  
 38086                                  ;Break   <TextFromDrive - convert a drive number to a text string>
 38087                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38088                                  ;   TextFromDrive - turn AL into a drive letter: and put it at es:di with
 38089                                  ;   trailing :. TextFromDrive1 takes a 1-based number.
 38090                                  ;
 38091                                  ;   Inputs:     AL has 0-based drive number
 38092                                  ;   Outputs:    ES:DI advanced

 38102 00006F95 AB                      	STOSW
 38103                                  PathPref_retn:
 38104 00006F96 C3                      	retn
 38105                                  
 38106                                  ;Break   <PathPref - see if one path is a prefix of another>
 38107                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38108                                  ;   PathPref - compare DS:SI with ES:DI to see if one is the prefix of the
 38109                                  ;   other.  Remember that only at a pathchar break are we allowed to have a
 38110                                  ;   prefix: A:\ and A:\FOO
 38111                                  ;
 38112                                  ;   Inputs:     DS:SI potential prefix
 38113                                  ;               ES:DI string
 38114                                  ;   Outputs:    Zero set => prefix found
 38115                                  ;                   DI/SI advanced past matching part
 38116                                  ;               Zero reset => no prefix, DS/SI garbage
 38117                                  ;   Registers modified: CX

 38120                                  PathPref:

 38122 00006F9A 49                      	DEC     CX                      ; do not include nul byte
 38123 00006F9B F3A6                    	REPZ    CMPSB                   ; compare
 38124 00006F9D 75F7                    	jnz	short PathPref_retn	; if NZ then return NZ
 38125 00006F9F 50                      	push	ax			; save char register
 38126 00006FA0 8A44FF                  	MOV     AL,[SI-1]               ; get last byte to match
 38127 00006FA3 E8B6E1                  	call    PATHCHRCMP              ; is it a path char (Root!)
 38128 00006FA6 7406                    	JZ	short Prefix		; yes, match root (I hope)
 38129                                  NotSep:                                 ; 2/13/KK
 38130 00006FA8 268A05                  	MOV     AL,[ES:DI]		; get next char to match
 38131 00006FAB E877FE                  	CALL    PathSepGotCh            ; was it a pathchar?
 38132                                  Prefix:
 38133 00006FAE 58                      	pop	ax			; get back original
 38134 00006FAF C3                      	retn

 38137                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 38167                                  ; MSDOS 2.11
 38168                                  ;BREAK <$Open - open a file handle>
 38169                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38170                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 38171                                  ;           LDS     DX, Name
 38172                                  ;           MOV     AH, Open
 38173                                  ;           MOV     AL, access
 38174                                  ;           INT     int_command
 38175                                  ;
 38176                                  ;       ACCESS          Function
 38177                                  ;       ------          --------
 38178                                  ;       open_for_read   file is opened for reading
 38179                                  ;       open_for_write  file is opened for writing
 38180                                  ;       open_for_both   file is opened for both reading and writing.
 38181                                  ;
 38182                                  ;   Error returns:
 38183                                  ;           AX = error_invalid_access
 38184                                  ;              = error_file_not_found
 38185                                  ;              = error_access_denied
 38186                                  ;              = error_too_many_open_files
 38187                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38188                                  
 38189                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 38190                                  ;	BREAK <$Open - open a file from a path string>
 38191                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38192                                  ;
 38193                                  ;**	$OPen - Open a File
 38194                                  ;
 38195                                  ;	given a path name in DS:DX and an open mode in AL, $Open opens the
 38196                                  ;	file and and returns a handle
 38197                                  ;
 38198                                  ;	ENTRY	(DS:DX) = pointer to asciz name
 38199                                  ;		(AL) = open mode
 38200                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 38201                                  ;		  (ax) = file handle
 38202                                  ;		'C' set if error
 38203                                  ;		  (ax) = error code
 38204                                  ;	USES	all
 38205                                  ;
 38206                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38207                                  
 38208                                  ; 13/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38209                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 38210                                  
 38211                                  _$OPEN:       
 38212 00006FB9 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah  ; MSDOS 6.0	
 38213                                  _$Open2:
 38214                                  	;mov	ch,16h
 38215 00006FBB B516                    	mov	ch,attr_hidden+attr_system+attr_directory
 38216 00006FBD E85702                  	call	SetAttrib
 38217 00006FC0 B9[DA2B]                	mov	cx,DOS_OPEN
 38218                                  
 38219                                  	;xor	ah,ah  ; MSDOS 3.3
 38220                                  
 38221 00006FC3 50                      	push	ax
 38222                                  
 38223                                  ;*	General file open/create code. The $CREATE call and the various
 38224                                  ;	$OPEN calls all come here.
 38225                                  ;
 38226                                  ;	We'll share a lot of the standard stuff of allocating SFTs, cracking
 38227                                  ;	path names, etc., and then dispatch to our individual handlers.
 38228                                  ;	WARNING - this info and list is just a guess, not definitive - jgl
 38229                                  ;
 38230                                  ;	(TOS) = create mode
 38231                                  ;	(CX) = address of routine to call to do actual function
 38232                                  ;	(DS:DX) = ASCIZ name
 38233                                  ;	SAttrib = Attribute mask
 38234                                  
 38235                                  ;	Get a free SFT and mark it "being allocated"
 38236                                  
 38237                                  AccessFile:
 38238 00006FC4 E8C1A3                  	call	ECritSFT
 38239 00006FC7 E8D3F7                  	call	SFNFree			; get a free sfn
 38240 00006FCA E8D6A3                  	call	LCritSFT
 38241 00006FCD 7214                    	jc	short OpenFailJ		; oops, no free sft's
 38242 00006FCF 36891E[AA05]            	MOV	[SS:SFN],BX		; save the SFN for later;smr;SS Override
 38243 00006FD4 36893E[9E05]            	MOV	[SS:THISSFT],DI		; save the SF offset	;smr;SS Override
 38244 00006FD9 368C06[A005]            	MOV	[SS:THISSFT+2],ES	; save the SF segment	;smr;SS Override
 38245                                  
 38246                                  ;	Find a free area in the user's JFN table.
 38247                                  
 38248 00006FDE E8A9F7                  	call	JFNFree			; get a free jfn
 38249 00006FE1 7303                    	jnc	short SaveJFN
 38250                                  OpenFailJ:
 38251 00006FE3 E99300                  	JMP	OpenFail		; there were free JFNs... try SFN
 38252                                  
 38253                                  SaveJFN:
 38254 00006FE6 36893E[AE05]            	mov	[ss:PJFN],DI		; save the jfn offset	;smr;SS Override
 38255 00006FEB 368C06[B005]            	MOV	[ss:PJFN+2],ES		; save the jfn segment	;smr;SS Override
 38256 00006FF0 36891E[AC05]            	MOV	[ss:JFN],BX		; save the jfn itself	;smr;SS Override
 38257                                  
 38258                                  ;	We have been given an JFN. We lock it down to prevent other tasks from
 38259                                  ;	reusing the same JFN.
 38260                                  
 38261 00006FF5 368B1E[AA05]            	MOV	BX,[ss:SFN]					;smr;SS Override
 38262 00006FFA 26881D                  	MOV	[ES:DI],BL		; assign the JFN
 38263 00006FFD 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX			; get name in appropriate place
 38264 00006FFF BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF		; appropriate buffer
 38265 00007002 51                      	push	cx			; save routine to call
 38266 00007003 E843FC                  	call	TransPath		; convert the path
 38267 00007006 5B                      	pop	bx			; (bx) = routine to call
 38268                                  
 38269 00007007 36C536[9E05]            	LDS	SI,[SS:THISSFT]					;smr;SS Override
 38270 0000700C 720A                    	JC	short OpenCleanJ	; no error, go and open file
 38271 0000700E 36803E[7A05]FF          	CMP	byte [ss:CMETA],-1				;smr;SS Override
 38272 00007014 7404                    	JZ	short SetSearch
 38273                                  	;mov	al,2
 38274 00007016 B002                    	MOV	AL,error_file_not_found ; no meta chars allowed
 38275                                  OpenCleanJ:
 38276 00007018 EB50                    	JMP	short OpenClean
 38277                                  
 38278                                  SetSearch:
 38279 0000701A 58                      	pop	ax			; Mode (Open), Attributes (Create)
 38280                                  
 38281                                  ;	We need to get the new inheritance bits.
 38282                                  
 38283 0000701B 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38284                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 38285                                  	;mov	[si+2],cx ; 0
 38286 0000701D 894C02                  	MOV	[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],cx ; initialize mode field to 0
 38287                                  	;mov    [si+51],cx ; 0
 38288 00007020 894C33                  	MOV	[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],cx	 ; clean out sharing info
 38289                                  	;
 38290 00007023 81FB[DA2B]              	CMP	BX,DOS_OPEN
 38291 00007027 7509                    	JNZ	short _DoOper
 38292                                  	;test   al,80h
 38293 00007029 A880                    	test	AL,SHARING_NO_INHERIT	; look for no inher
 38294 0000702B 7405                    	JZ	short _DoOper ; 10/08/2018
 38295 0000702D 247F                    	AND	AL,7Fh			; mask off inherit bit
 38296                                  	;mov	cx,1000h
 38297 0000702F B90010                  	MOV	CX,sf_no_inherit
 38298                                  _DoOper:
 38299                                  	;; MSDOS 3.3
 38300                                  	;;mov	word [si+2], 0
 38301                                  	;;mov	word [si+33h], 0
 38302                                  	;MOV	word [SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],0
 38303                                  	;MOV	word [SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],0
 38304                                  
 38305                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 38306                                  ;**	Check if this is an extended open. If so you must set the
 38307                                  ;	modes in sf_mode. Call Set_EXT_mode to do all this. See
 38308                                  ;	Set_EXT_mode in creat.asm
 38309                                  
 38310                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 38311                                  	;SAVE	<di, es>                ;M022 conditional removed here
 38312 00007032 57                      	push	di
 38313 00007033 06                      	push	es
 38314 00007034 1E                      	push	ds
 38315 00007035 07                      	pop	es
 38316 00007036 56                      	push	si
 38317 00007037 5F                      	pop	di			; (es:di) = SFT address
 38318 00007038 E88BBB                  	call	Set_EXT_mode
 38319                                  	;RESTORE <es, di>
 38320 0000703B 07                      	pop	es
 38321 0000703C 5F                      	pop	di
 38322                                  
 38323                                  	;Context DS
 38324 0000703D 16                      	push	ss
 38325 0000703E 1F                      	pop	ds	
 38326                                  
 38327 0000703F 51                      	push	cx
 38328 00007040 FFD3                    	CALL	BX			; blam!
 38329 00007042 59                      	pop	cx
 38330 00007043 C536[9E05]              	LDS	SI,[THISSFT]
 38331 00007047 721A                    	JC	short OpenE2		;AN000;FT. chek extended open hooks first
 38332                                  	;jc	short OpenE ; MSDOS 3.3
 38333                                  
 38334                                  ;	The SFT was successfully opened. Remove busy mark.
 38335                                  
 38336                                  OpenOK:

 38685                                  ;Break <$CreateNewFile - Create a new directory entry>
 38686                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38687                                  ;   CreateNew - Create a new directory entry.  Return a file handle if there
 38688                                  ;	was no previous directory entry, and fail if a directory entry with
 38689                                  ;	the same name existed previously.
 38690                                  ;
 38691                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an ASCIZ file name
 38692                                  ;		CX contains default file attributes
 38693                                  ;   Outputs:	Carry Clear:
 38694                                  ;		    AX has file handle opened for read/write
 38695                                  ;		Carry Set:
 38696                                  ;		    AX has error code
 38697                                  ;   Registers modified: All
 38698                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38699                                  
 38700                                  _$CreateNewFile:
 38701 00007179 51                      	push	cx			; Save attributes on stack

 38704                                  
 38705                                  ;**	BinToAscii - convert a number to a string.
 38706                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38707                                  ;	BinToAscii converts a 16 bit number into a 4 ascii characters.
 38708                                  ;	This routine is used to generate temp file names so we don't spend
 38709                                  ;	the time and code needed for a true hex number, we just use
 38710                                  ;	A thorugh O.
 38711                                  ;
 38712                                  ;	ENTRY	(ax) = value
 38713                                  ;		(es:di) = destination
 38714                                  ;	EXIT	(es:di) updated by 4
 38715                                  ;	USES	cx, di, flags
 38716                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38717                                  
 38718                                  ; MSDOS 3.3
 38719                                  ;BinToAscii:
 38720                                  ;	mov     cx,4
 38721                                  ;bta5:
 38722                                  ;	push    cx
 38723                                  ;	mov     cl,4
 38724                                  ;	rol     ax,cl
 38725                                  ;	push    ax
 38726                                  ;	and     al,0Fh
 38727                                  ;	add     al,'0'
 38728                                  ;	cmp     al,'9'
 38729                                  ;	jbe     short bta6
 38730                                  ;	add     al,7
 38731                                  ;bta6: 
 38732                                  ;	stosb
 38733                                  ;	pop     ax
 38734                                  ;	pop     cx
 38735                                  ;	loop    bta5
 38736                                  ;	retn
 38737                                  
 38738                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 38739                                  BinToAscii:
 38740 00007180 B90404                  	mov	cx,404h			; (ch) = digit counter, (cl) = shift cnt
 38741                                  bta5:	
 38742 00007183 D3C0                    	ROL	AX,CL			; move leftmost nibble into rightmost
 38743 00007185 50                      	push	ax			; preserve remainder of digits
 38744 00007186 240F                    	AND	AL,0Fh			; grab low nibble
 38745 00007188 0441                    	ADD	AL,'A'			; turn into ascii
 38746 0000718A AA                      	STOSB				; drop in the character
 38747 0000718B 58                      	pop	ax			; (ax) = shifted number
 38748 0000718C FECD                    	dec	ch
 38749 0000718E 75F3                    	jnz	short bta5		; process 4 digits
 38750 00007190 C3                      	retn
 38751                                  
 38752                                  ;Break	<$CreateTempFile - create a unique name>
 38753                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38754                                  ;   $CreateTemp - given a directory, create a unique name in that directory.
 38755                                  ;	Method used is to get the current time, convert to a name and attempt
 38756                                  ;	a create new. Repeat until create new succeeds.
 38757                                  ;
 38758                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to a null terminated directory name.
 38759                                  ;		CX  contains default attributes
 38760                                  ;   Outputs:	Unique name is appended to DS:DX directory.
 38761                                  ;		AX has handle
 38762                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 38763                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38764                                  
 38765                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 38766                                  
 38767                                  _$CreateTempFile:
 38768                                  	;Enter
 38769 00007191 55                      	push	bp
 38770 00007192 89E5                    	mov	bp,sp
 38771                                  
 38772                                  	;LocalVar  EndPtr,DWORD
 38773                                  	;LocalVar  FilPtr,DWORD
 38774                                  	;LocalVar  Attr,WORD
 38775                                  
 38776 00007194 83EC0A                  	sub	sp,10
 38777                                  
 38778                                  	;test	cx,0FFD8h
 38779 00007197 F7C1D8FF                	test	CX,~attr_changeable
 38780 0000719B 7405                    	JZ	short OKatts		; Ok if no non-changeable bits set
 38781                                  
 38782                                  ; We need this "hook" here to detect these cases (like user sets one both of
 38783                                  ; vol_id and dir bits) because of the structure of the or $CreateNewFile loop
 38784                                  ; below. The code loops on error_access_denied, but if one of the non
 38785                                  ; changeable attributes is specified, the loop COULD be infinite or WILL be
 38786                                  ; infinite because CreateNewFile will fail with access_denied always. Thus we
 38787                                  ; need to detect these cases before getting to the loop.
 38788                                  
 38789                                  	;mov	ax, 5
 38790 0000719D B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 38791 000071A0 EB69                    	JMP	SHORT SETTMPERR
 38792                                  
 38793                                  OKatts:
 38794                                  	;MOV	attr,CX 		; save attribute
 38795 000071A2 894EF6                  	mov     [bp-10],cx
 38796                                  	;MOV	FilPtrL,DX		; pointer to file
 38797 000071A5 8956F8                  	mov	[bp-8],dx
 38798                                  	;MOV	FilPtrH,DS
 38799 000071A8 8C5EFA                  	mov	[bp-6],ds
 38800                                  	;MOV	EndPtrH,DS		; seg pointer to end of dir
 38801 000071AB 8C5EFE                  	mov	[bp-2],ds
 38802 000071AE 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 38803 000071AF 07                      	POP	ES			; destination for nul search
 38804 000071B0 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX
 38805 000071B2 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI

 38807                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 38855                                  ; The operation failed and the error has been mapped in AX. Grab the extended
 38856                                  ; error and figure out what to do.
 38857

 38906                                  ;   SetAttrib will set the search attribute (SAttrib) either to the normal
 38907                                  ;   (CH) or to the value in CL if the current system call is through
 38908                                  ;   serverdoscall.

 38928                                  ;Break	<Extended_Open- Extended open the file>
 38929                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38930                                  ; Input: AL= 0 reserved  AH=6CH
 38931                                  ;	 BX= mode
 38932                                  ;	 CL= create attribute  CH=search attribute (from server)
 38933                                  ;	 DX= flag
 38934                                  ;	 DS:SI = file name
 38935                                  ;	 ES:DI = parm list
 38936                                  ;			   DD  SET EA list (-1) null
 38937                                  ;			   DW  n  parameters
 38938                                  ;			   DB  type (TTTTTTLL)
 38939                                  ;			   DW  IOMODE

 38941                                  ; Output: carry clear
 38942                                  ;		     AX= handle
 38943                                  ;		     CX=1 file opened
 38944                                  ;			2 file created/opened

 39149                                  ; 14/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 39150                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39151                                  
 39152                                  ;BREAK <$LockOper - Lock Calls>
 39153                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39154                                  ;
 39155                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 39156                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle	       (DOS 3.3)
 39157                                  ;	    MOV     CX, OffsetHigh
 39158                                  ;	    MOV     DX, OffsetLow
 39159                                  ;	    MOV     SI, LengthHigh
 39160                                  ;	    MOV     DI, LengthLow
 39161                                  ;	    MOV     AH, LockOper
 39162                                  ;	    MOV     AL, Request
 39163                                  ;	    INT     21h
 39164                                  ;
 39165                                  ;   Error returns:
 39166                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 39167                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 39168                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 39169                                  ;
 39170                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 39171                                  ;	    MOV     AX, 5C??	       (DOS 4.00)
 39172                                  ;
 39173                                  ;				    0? lock all
 39174                                  ;				    8? lock write
 39175                                  ;				    ?2 lock multiple
 39176                                  ;				    ?3 unlock multiple
 39177                                  ;				    ?4 lock/read
 39178                                  ;				    ?5 write/unlock
 39179                                  ;				    ?6 add (lseek EOF/lock/write/unlock)
 39180                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle
 39181                                  ;	    MOV     CX, count or size

 39510                                  ; SHARE_CHECK
 39511                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39512                                  ; Inputs:
 39513                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to filled in local file/device SFT for new
 39514                                  ;               instance of file sf_mode ALWAYS has mode (even on FCB SFTs)

 39518                                  ; Function:

 39520                                  ; Outputs:

 39522                                  ;       Sharing approved

 39536                                  ; SHARE_VIOLATION
 39537                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39538                                  ; Inputs:
 39539                                  ;       [THISDPB] Set
 39540                                  ;       AX has error code
 39541                                  ; Function:
 39542                                  ;       Handle Sharing errors

 39555                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 39556 0000742E C606[4B03]18            	MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 39557 00007433 C42E[8A05]              	LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 39558 00007437 BF0100                  	MOV     DI,1			; Fake some registers
 39559 0000743A 89F9                    	MOV     CX,DI

 39561 0000743C 268B5611                	MOV     DX,[ES:BP+DPB.DIR_SECTOR]

 39570                                  
 39571                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39572                                  ;   ShareEnd - terminate sharing info on a particular SFT/UID/PID. This does
 39573                                  ;       NOT perform a close, it merely asserts that the sharing information
 39574                                  ;       for the SFT/UID/PID may be safely released.
 39575                                  ;
 39576                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI points to an SFT
 39577                                  ;   Outputs:    None
 39578                                  ;   Registers modified: all except DS,ES,DI
 39579                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39580                                  
 39581                                  ShareEnd:
 39582                                  	; 26/07/2019
 39583 0000744C FF1E[9800]              	call	far [JShare+(2*4)]	; 2 = MFTClose
 39584 00007450 C3                      	retn
 39585                                  
 39586                                  ;Break <ShareEnter - attempt to enter a node into the sharing set>
 39587                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39588                                  ;   ShareEnter - perform a retried entry of a nodde into the sharing set. If
 39589                                  ;   the max number of retries is exceeded, we notify the user via int 24.
 39590                                  ;
 39591                                  ;   Inputs:     ThisSFT points to the SFT
 39592                                  ;               WFP_Start points to the WFP
 39593                                  ;   Outputs:    Carry clear => successful entry
 39594                                  ;               Carry set => failed system call
 39595                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 39596                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39597                                  
 39598                                  ShareEnter:
 39599 00007451 51                      	push	cx
 39600                                  retry:
 39601 00007452 8B0E[1A00]              	mov     cx,[RetryCount]
 39602                                  attempt:
 39603 00007456 C43E[9E05]              	les     di,[THISSFT]		; grab sft
 39604 0000745A 31C0                    	XOR     AX,AX
 39605                                   	;mov	[es:di+51],axfff
 39606 0000745C 26894533                	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],AX ; indicate free SFT
 39607 00007460 51                      	push	cx
 39608 00007461 E8BDFF                  	call    SHARE_CHECK             ; attempt to enter into the sharing set
 39609 00007464 59                      	pop	cx
 39610 00007465 730A                    	jnc	short done		; success, let the user see this
 39611 00007467 E8149E                  	call	Idle                    ; wait a while
 39612 0000746A E2EA                    	loop    attempt                 ; go back for another attempt
 39613 0000746C E8B7FF                  	call    SHARE_VIOLATION         ; signal the problem to the user
 39614 0000746F 73E1                    	jnc	short retry		; user said to retry, go do it
 39615                                  done:
 39616 00007471 59                      	pop	cx
 39617 00007472 C3                      	retn
 39618                                  
 39619                                  ;============================================================================
 39620                                  ; EXEPATCH.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 39621                                  ;============================================================================
 39622                                  ; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS 4.0
 39623                                  
 39624                                  ;** EXEPATCH.ASM 
 39625                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39626                                  ;	Contains the foll:
 39627                                  ;
 39628                                  ;		- code to find and overlay buggy unpack code
 39629                                  ;		- new code to be overlayed on buggy unpack code 
 39630                                  ;		- old code sequence to identify buggy unpack code
 39631                                  ;
 39632                                  ;	Revision history:
 39633                                  ;
 39634                                  ;		Created: 5/14/90
 39635                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39636                                  
 39637                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39638                                  ;
 39639                                  ; M020 : Fix for rational bug - for details see routine header
 39640                                  ; M028 : 4b04 implementation
 39641                                  ; M030 : Fixing bug in EXEPACKPATCH (EXEC_CS is an un-relocated value)
 39642                                  ; M032 : set turnoff bit only if DOS in HMA.
 39643                                  ; M033 : if IP < 2 then not exepacked.
 39644                                  ; M046 : support for a 4th version of exepacked files.
 39645                                  ; M068 : support for copy protected apps.
 39646                                  ; M071 : use A20OFF_COUNT of 10.
 39647                                  ;
 39648                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39649                                  
 39650                                  PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	EQU	06CH
 39651                                  PATCH1_OFFSET		EQU	028H
 39652                                  PATCH1_CHKSUM		EQU	0EF4EH
 39653                                  CHKSUM1_LEN		EQU	11CH/2 ; 142
 39654                                  
 39655                                  PATCH2_COM_OFFSET	EQU	076H
 39656                                  PATCH2_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 39657                                  
 39658                                  	; The strings that start at offset 076h have two possible 
 39659                                  	; check sums that are defined as PATCH2_CHKSUM PATCH2A_CHKSUM
 39660                                  
 39661                                  PATCH2_CHKSUM		EQU	78B2H
 39662                                  CHKSUM2_LEN		EQU	119H/2
 39663                                  PATCH2A_CHKSUM		EQU	1C47H		; M046
 39664                                  CHKSUM2A_LEN		EQU	103H/2		; M046
 39665                                  
 39666                                  PATCH3_COM_OFFSET	EQU	074H
 39667                                  PATCH3_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 39668                                  PATCH3_CHKSUM		EQU	4EDEH
 39669                                  CHKSUM3_LEN		EQU	117H/2
 39670                                  
 39671                                  ;**	Data structure passed for ExecReady call
 39672                                  ;
 39673                                  ;struc ERStruc
 39674                                  ; .ER_Reserved:	resw	1	; reserved, should be zero
 39675                                  ; .ER_Flags:	resw	1
 39676                                  ; .ER_ProgName:	resd	1	; ptr to ASCIIZ str of prog name
 39677                                  ; .ER_PSP:	resw	1	; PSP of the program
 39678                                  ; .ER_StartAddr: resd	1	; Start CS:IP of the program
 39679                                  ; .ER_ProgSize:	resd	1	; Program size including PSP
 39680                                  ; .size:
 39681                                  ;endstruc
 39682                                  
 39683                                  ;DOSCODE SEGMENT
 39684                                  
 39685                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39686                                  	; DOSCODE:B3DDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 39687                                  
 39688                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 39689                                  	; DOSCODE:B37Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 39690                                  
 39691                                  ; M028 - BEGIN
 39692                                  
 39693                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39694                                  ;
 39695                                  ;	Procedure Name		: ExecReady
 39696                                  ;
 39697                                  ;	Input			: DS:DX -> ERStruc (see exe.inc)
 39698                                  ;
 39699                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39700                                  
 39701                                  ExecReady:
 39702 00007473 89D6                    	mov	si,dx			; move the pointer into a friendly one
 39703                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 39704                                  	; 17/12/2022
 39705 00007475 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 39706                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; COM or EXE ?
 39707 00007479 7413                    	jz	short er_setver		; only setver for .COM files
 39708                                  
 39709                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 39710 0000747B 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 39711 0000747E 83C010                  	add	ax,10h
 39712 00007481 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39713                                  
 39714                                  	;mov	cx,[si+10]
 39715 00007483 8B4C0A                  	mov	cx,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr]   ; M030
 39716                                  	;mov	cx,[si+12]
 39717 00007486 8B440C                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr+2] ; M030
 39718                                  
 39719 00007489 36FF16[1212]            	call	[ss:FixExePatch]
 39720                                  	
 39721                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 39722                                  	;call	[ss:Rational386PatchPtr]
 39723                                  
 39724                                  er_setver:
 39725                                  	;;test	word [si+2],2		; Q: is this an overlay
 39726                                  	; 17/12/2022
 39727 0000748E F6440202                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY ; 2
 39728                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY
 39729 00007492 7518                    	jnz	short er_chkdoshi	; Y: set A20OFF_COUNT if DOS high
 39730                                  					; N: set up lie version first
 39731 00007494 1E                      	push	ds
 39732 00007495 56                      	push	si
 39733                                  	;lds	si,[si+4]
 39734 00007496 C57404                  	lds	si,[si+ERStruc.ER_ProgName]
 39735 00007499 E870ED                  	call	Scan_Execname1
 39736 0000749C E881ED                  	call	Scan_Special_Entries
 39737 0000749F 5E                      	pop	si
 39738 000074A0 1F                      	pop	ds
 39739                                  	;mov	es,[si+8]
 39740 000074A1 8E4408                  	mov	es,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 39741 000074A4 36A1[BD0E]              	mov	ax,[ss:SPECIAL_VERSION]
 39742 000074A8 26A34000                	mov	[es:PDB.Version],ax
 39743                                  
 39744                                  er_chkdoshi:
 39745 000074AC 36803E[1112]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DosHasHMA],0	; M032: Q: is dos in HMA (M021)
 39746 000074B2 741F                    	je	short er_done		; M032: N: done
 39747                                  
 39748                                  					; M068 - Start
 39749                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 39750 000074B4 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]	; ax = PSP
 39751                                  
 39752                                  	;or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],4
 39753 000074B7 36800E[8600]04          	or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],EXECA20OFF ; Set bit to signal int 21
 39754                                  					; ah = 25 & ah= 49. See dossym.inc 
 39755                                  					; under TAG M003 & M009 for 
 39756                                  					; explanation
 39757                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 39758                                  	; 17/12/2022
 39759 000074BD F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 39760                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; Q: COM file
 39761 000074C1 7507                    	jnz	short er_setA20		; N: inc a20off_count, set 
 39762                                  					;    a20off_psp and ret
 39763 000074C3 1E                         	push	ds
 39764 000074C4 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; DS = load segment of com file.
 39765 000074C6 E85D03                  	call	IsCopyProt		; check if copy protected
 39766 000074C9 1F                      	pop	ds
 39767                                  
 39768                                  er_setA20:
 39769                                  	; We need to inc the A20OFF_COUNT here. Note that if the count
 39770                                  	; is non-zero at this point it indicates that the A20 is to be 
 39771                                  	; turned off for that many int 21 calls made by the app. In 
 39772                                  	; addition the A20 has to be turned off when we exit from this 
 39773                                  	; call. Hence the inc.
 39774                                  
 39775 000074CA 36FE06[8500]            	inc	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT]		
 39776 000074CF 36A3[6300]              	mov	[ss:A20OFF_PSP],ax	; set the PSP for which A20 is to be
 39777                                  					; turned OFF.
 39778                                  er_done:				; M068 - End
 39779 000074D3 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 39780 000074D5 C3                      	retn
 39781                                  
 39782                                  ; M028 - END
 39783
