 39785                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 39786                                  %if 0
 39787                                  
 39788                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39789                                  ;
 39790                                  ; procedure : Rational386Patch
 39791                                  ;
 39792                                  ; Older versions of the Rational DOS Extender have several bugs which trash
 39793                                  ; 386 registers (usually just the high word of 32 bit registers) during
 39794                                  ; interrupt processing. Lotus 123 3.1+ is a popular application that uses a
 39795                                  ; version of the Rational extender with the 32 bit register trashing bugs.
 39796                                  ;
 39797                                  ; This routine applies patches to the Rational DOS Extender to work around
 39798                                  ; most of the register trashing bugs.
 39799                                  ;
 39800                                  ; Note that there are additional register trashing bugs not fixed by these
 39801                                  ; patches. In particular, the high word of ESP and the FS and GS registers
 39802                                  ; may be modified on interrupts.
 39803                                  ;
 39804                                  ; There are two different Rational DOS Extender patchs in this module.
 39805                                  ; Rational386Patch is to correct 386 register trashing bugs on 386 or later
 39806                                  ; processors. This patch code is executed when MS-DOS is running on a 386
 39807                                  ; or later processor, regardless of whether MS-DOS is running in the HMA
 39808                                  ; or not.
 39809                                  ;
 39810                                  ; The other Rational patch routine (RationalPatch, below) fixes a register
 39811                                  ; trashing problem on 286 processors, and is only executed if MS-DOS is
 39812                                  ; running in the HMA.
 39813                                  ;
 39814                                  ; This patch detection and replacement is based on an example supplied by
 39815                                  ; Ben Williams at Rational.
 39816                                  ;
 39817                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39818                                  
 39819                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39820                                  ; DOSCODE:B448h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 39821                                  
 39822                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39823                                  ;
 39824                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 39825                                  ;
 39826                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39827                                  
 39828                                  rpFind1:
 39829                                  	db	0FAh, 0E4h, 21h, 60h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 43h, 8Bh, 16h
 39830                                  
 39831                                  rpFind1Len equ	$ - rpFind1
 39832                                  
 39833                                  ;	cli
 39834                                  ;	in	al, 21h
 39835                                  ;	pusha
 39836                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 39837                                  ;	out	43h, al
 39838                                  ;	mov	dx, ...
 39839                                  
 39840                                  rpFind1a:
 39841                                  	db	0B0h, 0Eh, 0E6h, 37h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 0F2h
 39842                                  
 39843                                  rpFind1aLen equ	$ - rpFind1a
 39844                                  
 39845                                  ;	mov	al, 0Eh
 39846                                  ;	out	37h, al
 39847                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 39848                                  ;	out	0F2h, al
 39849                                  
 39850                                  ; bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 39851                                  
 39852                                  rpFind2:
 39853                                  	db	0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 39854                                  
 39855                                  rpFind2Len equ	$ - rpFind2
 39856                                  
 39857                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0	;may be preceeded by PUSH CX (51h)
 39858                                  
 39859                                  rpFind3:
 39860                                  	db	0Fh, 22h, 0C0h, 0EAh
 39861                                  
 39862                                  rpFind3Len equ	$ - rpFind3
 39863                                  
 39864                                  ;	mov	cr0, eax	;may be preceeded by POP CX (59h)
 39865                                  ;	jmp	far ptr xxx	;change far ptr to go to replace3
 39866                                  ;	mov	ss, bx		;8E D3 ... and come back at or after this
 39867                                  
 39868                                  ; note, there is no rpRepl1 string
 39869                                  
 39870                                  rpRepl2:
 39871                                   	db	66h, 50h, 51h, 0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 39872                                  
 39873                                  rpRepl2Len equ	$ - rpRepl2
 39874                                  
 39875                                  ;	push	eax
 39876                                  ;	push	cx
 39877                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0
 39878                                  
 39879                                  rpRepl3:
 39880                                  	db	8Eh, 0D3h, 59h, 66h, 58h
 39881                                  
 39882                                  rpRepl3Len equ	$ - rpRepl3
 39883                                  
 39884                                  ;	mov	ss, bx
 39885                                  ;	pop	cx
 39886                                  ;	pop	eax
 39887                                  
 39888                                  ; bug # 2 -- loss of high EAX and ESI on 386+ only if VCPI
 39889                                  
 39890                                  rpFind4:
 39891                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 39892                                  
 39893                                  rpFind4Len equ	$ - rpFind4
 39894                                  
 39895                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 39896                                  ;	pop	ax
 39897                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 39898                                  
 39899                                  rpFind5:
 39900                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 0CDh, 67h, 8Bh, 0E1h, 0FFh, 0E3h
 39901                                  
 39902                                  rpFind5Len equ	$ - rpFind5
 39903                                  
 39904                                  ;	mov	ax, DE0Ch
 39905                                  ;	int	67h
 39906                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 39907                                  ;	jmp	bx
 39908                                  
 39909                                  rpRepl4:
 39910                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 39911                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 0A3h
 39912                                  
 39913                                  rpRepl4o1Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 39914                                  
 39915                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39916                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 89h, 36h
 39917                                  
 39918                                  rpRepl4o2Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 39919                                  
 39920                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39921                                  
 39922                                  rpRepl4Len equ	$ - rpRepl4
 39923                                  
 39924                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 39925                                  ;	pop	ax
 39926                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 39927                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], eax
 39928                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], esi
 39929                                  
 39930                                  rpRepl5:
 39931                                  	db	8Bh, 0E1h
 39932                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 0A1h
 39933                                  
 39934                                  rpRepl5o1Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 39935                                  
 39936                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39937                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 8Bh, 36h
 39938                                  
 39939                                  rpRepl5o2Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 39940                                  
 39941                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39942                                  	db	0FFh, 0E3h
 39943                                  
 39944                                  rpRepl5Len equ	$ - rpRepl5
 39945                                  
 39946                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 39947                                  ;	mov	eax, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 39948                                  ;	mov	esi, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 39949                                  ;	jmp	bx
 39950                                  
 39951                                  ; bug # 3 -- loss of high EAX, EBX, ECX, EDX on 386+ only if VCPI
 39952                                  
 39953                                  rpFind6:
 39954                                  	db	0FAh, 52h, 51h
 39955                                  
 39956                                  rpFind6Len equ	$ - rpFind6
 39957                                  
 39958                                  ;	cli
 39959                                  ;	push	dx
 39960                                  ;	push	cx
 39961                                  
 39962                                  rpFind7a:
 39963                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 66h, 26h, 0FFh, 1Eh
 39964                                  
 39965                                  rpFind7aLen equ	$ - rpFind7a
 39966                                  
 39967                                  ;	mov	ax, 0DE0Ch
 39968                                  ;	call	fword ptr es:[xxxx]
 39969                                  
 39970                                  rpFind7b:
 39971                                  	db	59h, 5Ah, 5Bh
 39972                                  
 39973                                  rpFind7bLen equ	$ - rpFind7b
 39974                                  
 39975                                  ;	pop	cx
 39976                                  ;	pop	dx
 39977                                  ;	pop	bx
 39978                                  
 39979                                  rpRepl6 :
 39980                                  	db	0FAh, 66h, 50h, 66h, 53h, 66h, 51h, 66h, 52h
 39981                                  
 39982                                  rpRepl6Len equ	$ - rpRepl6
 39983                                  
 39984                                  ;	cli
 39985                                  ;	push	eax
 39986                                  ;	push	ebx
 39987                                  ;	push	ecx
 39988                                  ;	push	edx
 39989                                  
 39990                                  rpRepl7:
 39991                                  	db	66h, 5Ah, 66h, 59h, 66h, 5Bh, 66h, 58h, 5Bh
 39992                                  
 39993                                  rpRepl7Len equ	$ - rpRepl7
 39994                                  
 39995                                  ;	pop	edx
 39996                                  ;	pop	ecx
 39997                                  ;	pop	ebx
 39998                                  ;	pop	eax
 39999                                  ;	pop	bx
 40000                                  
 40001                                  ; bug # 4 -- loss of high EAX and EBX on 386+ only if VCPI
 40002                                  
 40003                                  rpFind8:
 40004                                   	db	60h, 06h, 1Eh, 0B8h, 00h, 00h, 8Eh, 0D8h
 40005                                  
 40006                                  rpFind8Len equ	$ - rpFind8
 40007                                  
 40008                                  ;	pusha
 40009                                  ;	push	es
 40010                                  ;	push	ds
 40011                                  ;	mov	ax, dgroup	;jump back to here from replace8
 40012                                  ;	mov	ds, ax
 40013                                  
 40014                                  rpFind9 :
 40015                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 61h
 40016                                  
 40017                                  rpFind9Len equ	$ - rpFind9
 40018                                  
 40019                                  ;	pop	ds
 40020                                  ;	pop	es
 40021                                  ;	popa
 40022                                  
 40023                                  rpRepl8:
 40024                                   	db	66h, 60h, 06h, 1Eh
 40025                                  
 40026                                  rpRepl8Len equ	$ - rpRepl8
 40027                                  
 40028                                  ;	pushad
 40029                                  ;	push	es
 40030                                  ;	push	ds
 40031                                  
 40032                                  rpRepl9:
 40033                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 66h, 61h, 0C3h
 40034                                  
 40035                                  rpRepl9Len equ	$ - rpRepl9
 40036                                  
 40037                                  ;	pop	ds
 40038                                  ;	pop	es
 40039                                  ;	popad
 40040                                  ;	retn			;no need to jmp back to main-line
 40041                                  
 40042                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40043                                  
 40044                                  struc SearchPair
 40045                                   .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 40046                                   .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 40047                                   .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40048                                   .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40049                                   .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 40050                                   .size:
 40051                                  endstruc
 40052                                  
 40053                                  ;rpBug1Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind2, rpFind2Len, offset rpFind3, rpFind3Len, 20h>
 40054                                  
 40055                                  rpBug1Strs:
 40056                                  	dw	rpFind2
 40057                                  	dw	rpFind2Len ; 3
 40058                                  	dw	rpFind3
 40059                                  	dw	rpFind3Len ; 4
 40060                                  	dw	20h
 40061                                  
 40062                                  ;rpBug2Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind4, rpFind4Len, offset rpFind5, rpFind5Len, 80h>
 40063                                  
 40064                                  rpBug2Strs:
 40065                                  	dw	rpFind4
 40066                                  	dw	rpFind4Len ; 4
 40067                                  	dw	rpFind5
 40068                                  	dw	rpFind5Len ; 9
 40069                                  	dw	80h
 40070                                  
 40071                                  ;rpBug3Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind6, rpFind6Len, offset rpFind7a, rpFind7aLen, 80h>
 40072                                  
 40073                                  rpBug3Strs:
 40074                                  	dw	rpFind6
 40075                                  	dw	rpFind6Len ; 3
 40076                                  	dw	rpFind7a
 40077                                  	dw	rpFind7aLen ; 7
 40078                                  	dw	80h
 40079                                  
 40080                                  ;rpBug4Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind8, 4, offset rpFind9, rpFind9Len, 80h>
 40081                                  
 40082                                  rpBug4Strs:
 40083                                  	dw	rpFind8
 40084                                  	dw	4
 40085                                  	dw	rpFind9
 40086                                  	dw	rpFind9Len ; 3
 40087                                  	dw	80h
 40088                                  
 40089                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40090                                  
 40091                                  struc StackVars
 40092                                   .sv_wVersion:	resw 1		; Rational extender version #
 40093                                   .sv_cbCodeSeg: resw 1		; code seg size to scan
 40094                                   .sv_pPatch:	resw 1		; offset of next avail patch byte
 40095                                   .size:
 40096                                  endstruc
 40097                                  
 40098                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40099                                  
 40100                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 40101                                  
 40102                                  Rational386Patch:
 40103                                  	; Do a few quick checks to see if this looks like a Rational
 40104                                  	; Extended application. Hopefully this will quickly weed out
 40105                                  	; most non Rational apps.
 40106                                  
 40107                                  	cmp	word [es:0],395		; version number goes here - versions
 40108                                  	jae	short rp3QuickOut	;   3.95+ don't need patching
 40109                                  
 40110                                  	cmp	word [es:0Ch],20h	; always has this value here
 40111                                  	jne	short rp3QuickOut
 40112                                  
 40113                                  	push	ax
 40114                                  
 40115                                  	mov	ax,18h 			; extender has 18h at
 40116                                  	cmp	[es:24],ax		;   offsets 24, 28, & 36
 40117                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 40118                                  	cmp	[es:28],ax
 40119                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 40120                                  	cmp	[es:36],ax
 40121                                  	je	short rp3Maybe
 40122                                  rp3QO_ax:
 40123                                  	pop	ax
 40124                                  rp3QuickOut:
 40125                                  	retn
 40126                                  
 40127                                  ; It might be the rational extender, do more extensive checking
 40128                                  
 40129                                  rp3Maybe:
 40130                                  	cld
 40131                                  	push	bx			; note ax pushed above
 40132                                  	push	cx
 40133                                  	push	dx
 40134                                  	push	si
 40135                                  	push	di
 40136                                  	push	es
 40137                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 40138                                  	push	bp
 40139                                  	sub	sp,StackVars.size  ; 6	; make space for stack variables
 40140                                  	mov	bp,sp
 40141                                  
 40142                                  	push	cs
 40143                                  	pop	ds
 40144                                  
 40145                                  	mov	ax,[es:0]		; save version #
 40146                                  	;mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],ax
 40147                                  	mov	[bp],ax	
 40148                                  					; check that binary version # matches
 40149                                  	call	VerifyVersion		;   ascii string
 40150                                  	jne	short rp3Exit_j
 40151                                  
 40152                                  ; Looks like this is it, find where to put the patch code.  The
 40153                                  ; patch will be located on top of Rational code specific to 80286
 40154                                  ; processors, so these patchs MUST NOT be applied if running on
 40155                                  ; an 80286 system.
 40156                                  
 40157                                  	; Rational says the code to patch will never be beyond offset 46xxh
 40158                                  
 40159                                  	mov	cx,4500h		; force search len to 4700h (searches
 40160                                  	;mov	[bp+2],cx
 40161                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg],cx	; start at offset 200h)
 40162                                  
 40163                                  	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=code segment
 40164                                  
 40165                                  	mov	si,rpFind1		; string to find
 40166                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1Len ; 10	; length to match
 40167                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq
 40168                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 40169                                  
 40170                                  ; According to Rational, some very old versions of the extender may not
 40171                                  ; have the find1 code sequence. If the find1 code wasn't found above,
 40172                                  ; try an alternative patch area which is on top of NEC 98xx switching code.
 40173                                  
 40174                                  	mov	si,rpFind1a
 40175                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1aLen  ;8
 40176                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 40177                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 40178                                  
 40179                                  rp3Exit_j:
 40180                                  	jmp	rp3Exit
 40181                                  
 40182                                  ; Found the location to write patch code! DI = offset in code seg.
 40183                                  
 40184                                  rpGotPatch:
 40185                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40186                                  	mov	[bp-StackVars.sv_pPatch],di	; save patch pointer
 40187                                  
 40188                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40189                                  ; Bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 40190                                  
 40191                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],381
 40192                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],381 ; only need bug 1 if version
 40193                                  	cmp	word [bp],381
 40194                                  	jae	short rpBug2			;   < 3.81
 40195                                  
 40196                                  	mov	bx,rpBug1Strs			; locate find2 & find3 code
 40197                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40198                                  	jc	short rpBug2
 40199                                  
 40200                                  ; si = rpFind2 offset, di = rpFind3 offset
 40201                                  
 40202                                  	push	di
 40203                                  	mov	di,si				; rpFind2 offset
 40204                                  	mov	dx,rpFind2Len ; 3
 40205                                  
 40206                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],51h	 	; find2 preceeded by push cx?
 40207                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx
 40208                                  
 40209                                  	dec	di				;   yes, gobble up push cx too
 40210                                  	inc	dx
 40211                                  rp_no_cx:
 40212                                  	mov	si,rpRepl2			; patch out find2 sequence
 40213                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl2Len  ; 6
 40214                                  	call	GenPatch
 40215                                  
 40216                                  	pop	di				; rpFind3 offset
 40217                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],59h 		; find3 preceeded by pop cx?
 40218                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx2
 40219

 40221                                  rp_no_cx2:
 40222                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 40223                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; change offset of far jmp
 40224                                  	;mov	[es:di+4],ax
 40225                                  	mov	[es:di+rpFind3Len],ax		;   to go to patch code
 40226                                  
 40227                                  	push	di				; save find3 offset
 40228                                  	mov	si,rpRepl3			; copy repl3 to patch area
 40229                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl3Len ; 5
 40230                                  	call	CopyPatch
 40231

 40233                                  	add	bx,rpFind3Len+4	 ; 8		; skip over find3 and far jmp
 40234                                  	call	GenJump 			; jmp back from patch area
 40235                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40236                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch], di	;   to main-line, update patch
 40237                                  						;   area pointer
 40238                                  
 40239                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40240                                  ; Bug # 2 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 40241                                  
 40242                                  rpBug2:
 40243                                  	mov	bx,rpBug2Strs			; locate find4 & find5 code
 40244                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40245                                  	jc	short rpBug3
 40246                                  
 40247                                  ; si = rpFind4 offset, di = rpFind5 offset
 40248                                  
 40249                                  	;push	word [bp+4]
 40250                                  	push	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; save current patch pointer
 40251                                  						;   (where repl4 goes)
 40252                                  	push	di				; save find5 offset
 40253                                  
 40254                                  	mov	di,si
 40255                                  	mov	dx,rpFind4Len ; 4
 40256                                  	mov	si,rpRepl4
 40257                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl4Len ; 15
 40258                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find4 code
 40259                                  
 40260                                  	pop	di				; find5 offset
 40261                                  	add	di,5				; keep 5 bytes of find5 code
 40262                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 40263                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; jump to patch area
 40264                                  	push	bx				; save repl5 location
 40265                                  	call	GenJump
 40266                                  
 40267                                  	mov	si,rpRepl5			; copy repl5 code to patch
 40268                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl5Len  ; 15		;   area -- it has a jmp bx
 40269                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no need to jmp back to
 40270                                  						;   main-line code
 40271                                  
 40272                                  ; patches have been made, now update the patch code to store/load dwords just
 40273                                  ; after the code in the patch area
 40274                                  
 40275                                  	pop	di				; repl5 location
 40276                                  	pop	si				; repl4 location
 40277                                  
 40278                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 40279                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; (where dwords go)
 40280                                  
 40281                                  	;mov	[es:si+7],ax
 40282                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o1Len],ax		; offset for EAX
 40283                                  	;mov	[es:di+5],ax
 40284                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o1Len],ax
 40285                                  	add	ax,4
 40286                                  	;mov	[es:si+0Dh],ax
 40287                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o2Len],ax		; offset for ESI
 40288                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Bh],ax
 40289                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o2Len],ax
 40290                                  
 40291                                  	;add	word [bp+4],8
 40292                                  	add	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],8	; reserve space for 2 dwords in
 40293                                  						; patch area
 40294                                  
 40295                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40296                                  ; Bug # 3 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 40297                                  
 40298                                  rpBug3:
 40299                                  	mov	bx,rpBug3Strs			; locate find6 & find7a code
 40300                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40301                                  	jc	short rpBug4
 40302                                  
 40303                                  	;add	di,9
 40304                                  	add	di,rpFind7aLen + 2		; skip over offset in find7a
 40305                                  	push	si				;   code and locate find7b
 40306                                  	mov	si,rpFind7b			;   sequence
 40307                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 40308                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di
 40309                                  	pop	si
 40310                                  	jnz	short rpBug4
 40311                                  
 40312                                  	push	di				; save find7b code offset
 40313                                  
 40314                                  	mov	di,si
 40315                                  	mov	dx,rpFind6Len ; 3
 40316                                  	mov	si,rpRepl6
 40317                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl6Len ; 9
 40318                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find6 code
 40319

 40321                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 40322                                  	mov	si,rpRepl7
 40323                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl7Len ; 9
 40324                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find7b code
 40325                                  
 40326                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40327                                  ; Bug # 4 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 40328                                  
 40329                                  rpBug4:
 40330                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],360
 40331                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],360 ; only applies if 
 40332                                  	cmp	word [bp],360
 40333                                  	jbe	short rp3Exit 			; version > 3.60 and < 3.95
 40334

 40336                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40337                                  	jc	short rp3Exit
 40338

 40340

 40346

 40350                                  	call	GenJump 			;   patch area
 40351

 40353                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl9Len ; 5		;   patch area--it does a RET
 40354                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no jmp back to main-line
 40355                                  
 40356                                  rp3Exit:
 40357                                  	add	sp,StackVars.size
 40358                                  	pop	bp
 40359                                  	pop	ds
 40360                                  	pop	es
 40361                                  	pop	di
 40362                                  	pop	si
 40363                                  	pop	dx
 40364                                  	pop	cx
 40365                                  	pop	bx
 40366                                  	pop	ax
 40367                                  	retn
 40368                                  
 40369                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40370                                  ;
 40371                                  ; FindBadCode
 40372                                  ;
 40373                                  ; Searches Rational code segment looking for a pair of find strings (all
 40374                                  ; patches have at least two find strings).
 40375                                  ;
 40376                                  ; Entry:
 40377                                  ;	ES    = code segment to search
 40378                                  ;	DS:BX = search pair structure for this search
 40379                                  ;	[bp].sv_cbCodeSeg = length of code seg to search
 40380                                  ;
 40381                                  ; Exit:
 40382                                  ;	CY flag clear if both strings found, and
 40383                                  ;	SI    = offset in ES of 1st string
 40384                                  ;	DI    = offset in ES of 2nd string
 40385                                  ;	CY set if either string not found, or strings too far apart
 40386                                  ;
 40387                                  ; Used:
 40388                                  ;	CX
 40389                                  ;
 40390                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40391                                  
 40392                                  ;struc SearchPair
 40393                                  ; .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 40394                                  ; .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 40395                                  ; .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40396                                  ; .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40397                                  ; .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 40398                                  ; .size:
 40399                                  ;endstruc
 40400                                  
 40401                                  FindBadCode:
 40402                                  	;mov	cx,[bp+2]
 40403                                  	mov	cx,[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg]	; search length
 40404                                  
 40405                                  	mov	si,[bx]	; mov si,[bx+0]
 40406                                  	;mov	si,[bx+Searchpair.sp_off1] ; ds:si -> search string
 40407                                  	
 40408                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+2]
 40409                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len1] ; dx = search len
 40410                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 40411                                  	jnz	short fbc_error		; done if 1st not found
 40412                                  
 40413                                  	push	di			; save 1st string offset
 40414                                  
 40415                                  	;mov	si,[bx+4]
 40416                                  	mov	si,[bx+SearchPair.sp_off2]
 40417                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+6]
 40418                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len2]
 40419                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di		; don't change flags after this!
 40420                                  
 40421                                  	pop	si			; restore 1st string offset
 40422                                  	jnz	short fbc_error
 40423                                  
 40424                                  	mov	ax,di			; sanity check that
 40425                                  	sub	ax,si			;   si < di && di - si <= allowed diff
 40426                                  	jc	short fbc_error
 40427                                  	;cmp	ax,[bx+8]
 40428                                  	cmp	ax,[bx+SearchPair.sp_diff]
 40429                                  	ja	short fbc_error
 40430                                  
 40431                                  	clc
 40432                                  	retn
 40433                                  
 40434                                  fbc_error:
 40435                                  	stc
 40436                                  	retn
 40437                                  
 40438                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40439                                  ;
 40440                                  ; GenPatch
 40441                                  ;
 40442                                  ; Generate a patch sequence. 1) insert a jump at the buggy code location
 40443                                  ; (jumps to the patch code area), 2) copy the selected patch code to the
 40444                                  ; patch area, 3) insert a jump from the patch area back to the main-line
 40445                                  ; code.
 40446                                  ;
 40447                                  ; Entry:
 40448                                  ;	ES:DI = start of buggy code to be patched
 40449                                  ;	DX    = length of buggy code to be patched
 40450                                  ;	DS:SI = replacement patch code
 40451                                  ;	CX    = length of replacement patch code
 40452                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 40453                                  ;
 40454                                  ; Exit:
 40455                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after generated patch code
 40456                                  ;
 40457                                  ; Used:
 40458                                  ;	AX, BX, SI, Flags
 40459                                  ;
 40460                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40461                                  
 40462                                  GenPatch:
 40463                                  	push	di			;save offset of buggy code
 40464                                  
 40465                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 40466                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]
 40467                                  					;jump from buggy code to patch area
 40468                                  	call	GenJump
 40469                                  
 40470                                  	call	CopyPatch		;copy replacement code to patch area
 40471                                  
 40472                                  	pop	bx			;offset of buggy code + buggy code
 40473                                  	add	bx,dx			;  length = return from patch offset
 40474                                  
 40475                                  	call	GenJump 		;jump from patch area back to main-
 40476                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40477                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di
 40478                                  					;  line code, update patch pointer
 40479                                  	retn
 40480                                  
 40481                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40482                                  ;
 40483                                  ; CopyPatch
 40484                                  ;
 40485                                  ; Copies patch code to patch location.
 40486                                  ;
 40487                                  ; Entry:
 40488                                  ;	DS:SI = patch code to be copied
 40489                                  ;	ES    = segment of code to patch
 40490                                  ;	CX    = length of code to copy
 40491                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 40492                                  ;
 40493                                  ; Exit:
 40494                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after copied patch code
 40495                                  ;
 40496                                  ; Used:
 40497                                  ;	SI, Flags
 40498                                  ;
 40499                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40500                                  
 40501                                  CopyPatch:
 40502                                  	push	cx
 40503                                  	;mov	di,[bp+4]
 40504                                  	mov	di,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch] ;patch pointer is the dest offset
 40505                                  	cld
 40506                                  	rep movsb
 40507                                  	pop	cx
 40508                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40509                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di ;update net pointer location
 40510                                  	retn
 40511                                  
 40512                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40513                                  ;
 40514                                  ; GenJump
 40515                                  ;
 40516                                  ; Generates a rel16 JMP instruction at location 'from' to location 'to'.
 40517                                  ;
 40518                                  ; Entry:
 40519                                  ;	ES:DI = from location (where to put jmp instruction)
 40520                                  ;	BX    = to location (where to jump to)
 40521                                  ;
 40522                                  ; Exit:
 40523                                  ;	DI = byte after generated jump
 40524                                  ;
 40525                                  ; Used:
 40526                                  ;	AX
 40527                                  ;
 40528                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40529                                  
 40530                                  GenJump:
 40531                                  	mov	al,0E9h		; jmp rel16 opcode
 40532                                  	stosb
 40533                                  
 40534                                  	mov	ax,bx		; calc offset to 'to' location
 40535                                  	sub	ax,di
 40536                                  	sub	ax,2
 40537                                  
 40538                                  	stosw			; output offset
 40539                                  
 40540                                  	retn
 40541                                  
 40542                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40543                                  ;
 40544                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 40545                                  ;
 40546                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 40547                                  ;
 40548                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 40549                                  ;
 40550                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40551                                  
 40552                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 40553                                  	mov	di,200h
 40554                                  ScanCodeSeq_di:
 40555                                  	push	cx
 40556                                  	sub	cx,dx
 40557                                  	inc	cx
 40558                                  scsagain:
 40559                                  	push	si
 40560                                  	push	di
 40561                                  	push	cx
 40562                                  	mov	cx,dx
 40563                                  	rep	cmpsb
 40564                                  	pop	cx
 40565                                  	pop	di
 40566                                  	pop	si
 40567                                  	je	short scsfound
 40568                                  	inc	di
 40569                                  	loop	scsagain
 40570                                  scsfound:
 40571                                  	pop	cx
 40572                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 40573                                  	retn
 40574                                  	
 40575                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40576                                  ;
 40577                                  ; VerifyVersion
 40578                                  ;
 40579                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 40580                                  ; from ES:2A.
 40581                                  ;
 40582                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 40583                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 40584                                  ;
 40585                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40586                                  
 40587                                  VerifyVersion:
 40588                                  	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 40589                                  					;  in ascii
 40590                                  	mov	bl,10
 40591                                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 40592                                  
 40593                                  	call	VVDigit
 40594                                  	jne	short vvexit
 40595                                  	call	VVDigit
 40596                                  	jne	short vvexit
 40597                                  	cmp	byte [es:si],'.'
 40598                                  	jne	short vvexit
 40599                                  	dec	si
 40600                                  	;call	VVDigit
 40601                                  	; 18/12/2022
 40602                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 40603                                  ;vvexit:
 40604                                  	;retn
 40605                                  VVDigit:
 40606                                  	div	bl
 40607                                  	add	ah,'0'
 40608                                  	dec	si
 40609                                  	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 40610                                  	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 40611                                  	retn
 40612                                  
 40613                                  %endif
 40614

 40878                                  ;
 40879                                  ; Procedure Name 	: ExePackPatch
 40880                                  ;
 40881                                  ; Inputs	 	: DS 			-> DOSDATA
 40882                                  ;			  ES:0 			-> read in image
 40883                                  ;			  ax:cx = start cs:ip of program
 40884                                  ; Output		:		
 40885                                  ;
 40886                                  ;	1. If ES <= 0fffh
 40887                                  ;	   2. if exepack signature ('RB') found
 40888                                  ;	      3. if common code to patch compares (for 3 diff. versions)
 40889                                  ;	       	 4. if rest of the code & checksum compares
 40890                                  ;	  	    5. overlay buggy code with code in 
 40891                                  ;		       doscode:str1.
 40892                                  ;		 6. endif
 40893                                  ;	      7. endif
 40894                                  ;	   8. endif
 40895                                  ;	9. endif
 40896                                  ;
 40897                                  ;
 40898                                  ; Uses			: NONE

 41132                                  ;	Procedure Name	: chk_patchsum
 41133                                  ;
 41134                                  ;	Input		: DS:SI -> string we're looking for
 41135                                  ;			: ES:DI -> offset in packed file
 41136                                  ;			: CX 	= scan length
 41137                                  ;			: BX	= length of check sum
 41138                                  ;			: AX 	= value of check sum
 41139                                  ;
 41140                                  ;	Output		: if patch & check sum compare
 41141                                  ;				NC
 41142                                  ;			  else
 41143                                  ;				CY
 41144                                  ;
 41145                                  ;	Uses		: AX, BX, CX, SI

 41156                                  					; N: exit
 41157                                  					; Y:	
 41158                                  
 41159                                  		; we do a check sum starting from the location of the 
 41160                                  		; exepack signature 'RB' up to 11c/2 bytes, the end of the
 41161                                  		; unpacking code.
 41162                                  
 41163 0000772E 368B3E[8700]            	mov	di,[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET]	; di -> start of unpack code
 41164 00007733 89D9                    	mov	cx,bx			; cx = length of check sum
 41165                                  
 41166 00007735 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; save check sum passed to us in bx
 41167 00007737 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 41168                                  ep_chksum:
 41169 00007739 260305                  	add	ax,[es:di]
 41170 0000773C 83C702                  	add	di,2
 41171 0000773F E2F8                    	loop	ep_chksum
 41172                                  
 41173 00007741 5F                      	pop	di			; restore di
 41174                                  
 41175 00007742 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		 	; Q: does the check sum match
 41176 00007744 7502                    	jne	short cp_fail		; N: exit
 41177                                  					; Y: 
 41178 00007746 F8                      	clc	
 41179 00007747 C3                      	retn
 41180                                  
 41181                                  cp_fail:
 41182 00007748 F9                      	stc
 41183 00007749 C3                      	retn
 41184                                  
 41185                                  ; M020 : BEGIN
 41186                                  ;
 41187                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41188                                  ;
 41189                                  ; procedure : RationalPatch
 41190                                  ;
 41191                                  ; A routine (in Ration DOS extender) which is invoked at hardware interrupts
 41192                                  ; clobbers CX register on 286 machines. (123 release 3 uses Rational DOS
 41193                                  ; extender). This routine identifies Buggy Rational EXEs and fixes the bug.
 41194                                  ;
 41195                                  ; THE BUG is in the following code sequence:
 41196                                  ;
 41197                                  ;8b 0e 10 00	mov	cx, ds:[10h]		; delay count
 41198                                  ;90		even				; word align
 41199                                  ;e2 fe		loop	$			; wait		CLOBBERS CX
 41200                                  ;e8 xx xx	call	set_A20			; enable A20
 41201                                  ;
 41202                                  ; This patch routine replaces the mov & the loop with a far call into a
 41203                                  ; routine in DOS data segment which is in low memory (because A20 line
 41204                                  ; is off). The routine (RatBugCode) in DOS data saves & restores CX around
 41205                                  ; a mov & loop.
 41206                                  ;
 41207                                  ; Identification of Buggy Rational EXE
 41208                                  ; ====================================
 41209                                  ;
 41210                                  ; (ALL OFFSETS ARE IN THE PROGRAM SECTION - EXCLUDING THE EXE HEADER)
 41211                                  ;
 41212                                  ; OFFSET				Contains
 41213                                  ; ------				--------
 41214                                  ; 0000h			100 times Version number in binary
 41215                                  ;			bug exists in version 3.48 thru 3.83 (both inclusive)
 41216                                  ;
 41217                                  ; 000ah			the WORDS : 0000h, 0020h, 0000h, 0040h, 0001h
 41218                                  ;
 41219                                  ; 002ah			offset where version number is stored in ASCII
 41220                                  ;				e.g. '3.48A'
 41221                                  ;
 41222                                  ; 0030h			offset of copyright string. Copyright strings either
 41223                                  ;			start with "DOS/16M Copyright...." or
 41224                                  ;			"Copyright.....". The string contains
 41225                                  ;			"Rational Systems, Inc."
 41226                                  ;
 41227                                  ; 0020h			word : Paragraph offset of the buggy code segment
 41228                                  ;				from the program image
 41229                                  ; 0016h			word : size of buggy code segment
 41230                                  ;
 41231                                  ;	Buggy code is definite to start after offset 200h in its segment
 41232                                  ;
 41233                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41234                                  
 41235                                  ; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 41236                                  ; DOSCODE:B976h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 41237                                  
 41238                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 41239                                  ; DOSCODE:B654h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 41240                                  
 41241                                  RScanPattern1:
 41242 0000774A 000020000000400001-     	db	0, 0, 20h, 0, 0, 0, 40h, 0, 1, 0
 41242 00007753 00                 
 41243                                  
 41244                                  RLen1 equ $ - RScanPattern1
 41245                                  
 41246                                  RScanPattern2:
 41247 00007754 8B0E100090E2FEE8        	db	8Bh, 0Eh, 10h, 00h, 90h, 0E2h, 0FEh, 0E8h
 41248                                  
 41249                                  RLen2 equ $ - RScanPattern2
 41250                                  
 41251                                  RScanPattern3:
 41252 0000775C 8B0E1000E2FEE8          	db	8Bh, 0Eh, 10h, 00h, 0E2h, 0FEh, 0E8h
 41253                                  
 41254                                  RLen3 equ $ - RScanPattern2
 41255                                  
 41256                                  ; DOSCODE:B98Fh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 41257                                  ; DOSCODE:B66Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 41258                                  
 41259                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41260                                  ;
 41261                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 41262                                  ;
 41263                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41264                                  
 41265                                  RationalPatch:
 41266 00007763 FC                      	cld
 41267 00007764 50                      	push	ax
 41268 00007765 53                      	push	bx
 41269 00007766 51                      	push	cx
 41270 00007767 52                      	push	dx
 41271 00007768 56                      	push	si
 41272 00007769 57                      	push	di
 41273 0000776A 06                      	push	es
 41274 0000776B 1E                      	push	ds			; we use all of them
 41275 0000776C BF0A00                  	mov	di,0Ah			; look for pat1 at offset 0Ah
 41276 0000776F 0E                      	push	cs
 41277 00007770 1F                      	pop	ds
 41278                                  	
 41279 00007771 BE[4A77]                	mov	si,RScanPattern1
 41280                                  	;mov	cx,10
 41281 00007774 B90A00                  	mov	cx,RLen1
 41282 00007777 F3A6                    	rep	cmpsb			; do we have the pattern ?
 41283 00007779 754A                    	jne	short rpexit
 41284 0000777B 26A10000                	mov	ax,[es:0]
 41285 0000777F 3D5C01                  	cmp	ax,348			; is it a buggy version ?
 41286 00007782 7241                    	jb	short rpexit
 41287 00007784 3D7F01                  	cmp	ax,383			; is it a buggy version
 41288 00007787 773C                    	ja	short rpexit
 41289                                  
 41290 00007789 E85A00                  	call	VerifyVersion
 41291 0000778C 7537                    	jne	short rpexit
 41292                                  
 41293 0000778E 268B0E1600              	mov	cx,[es:16h]		; Length of buggy code seg
 41294 00007793 81E90002                	sub	cx,200h			; Length we search (we start
 41295                                  					;  at offset 200h)
 41296 00007797 268E062000              	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=buggy code segment
 41297 0000779C BE[5477]                	mov	si,RScanPattern2
 41298                                  	;mov	dx,8	
 41299 0000779F BA0800                  	mov	dx,RLen2
 41300 000077A2 E82900                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq with nop
 41301 000077A5 740B                    	jz	short rpfound
 41302                                  
 41303 000077A7 BE[5C77]                	mov	si,RScanPattern3
 41304                                  	;mov	dx,15
 41305 000077AA BA0F00                  	mov	dx,RLen3
 41306 000077AD E81E00                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq w/o nop
 41307 000077B0 7513                    	jnz	short rpexit
 41308                                  
 41309                                  rpfound:
 41310                                  	
 41311                                  ;	we set up a far call into DOS data
 41312                                  ;	dx has the length of the code seq we were searching for
 41313                                  
 41314 000077B2 B09A                    	mov	al,9Ah			; far call opcode
 41315 000077B4 AA                      	stosb
 41316 000077B5 B8[1612]                	mov	ax,RatBugCode
 41317 000077B8 AB                      	stosw
 41318 000077B9 8CD0                    	mov	ax,ss
 41319 000077BB AB                      	stosw
 41320 000077BC 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 41321 000077BE 83E906                  	sub	cx,6			; filler (with NOPs)
 41322 000077C1 B090                    	mov	al,90h
 41323 000077C3 F3AA                    	rep	stosb
 41324                                  rpexit:
 41325 000077C5 1F                      	pop	ds
 41326 000077C6 07                      	pop	es
 41327 000077C7 5F                      	pop	di
 41328 000077C8 5E                      	pop	si
 41329 000077C9 5A                      	pop	dx
 41330 000077CA 59                      	pop	cx
 41331 000077CB 5B                      	pop	bx
 41332 000077CC 58                      	pop	ax
 41333 000077CD C3                      	retn
 41334                                  
 41335                                  ; M020 END
 41336                                  
 41337                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 41338                                  ; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 41339                                  
 41340                                  ; DOSCODE:B6D8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 41341                                  
 41342                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41343                                  ;
 41344                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 41345                                  ;
 41346                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 41347                                  ;
 41348                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 41349                                  ;
 41350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41351                                  
 41352                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 41353                                  	; 17/12/2022
 41354 000077CE BF0002                  	mov	di,200h
 41355                                  ;ScanCodeSeq_di:
 41356 000077D1 51                      	push	cx
 41357 000077D2 29D1                    	sub	cx,dx
 41358 000077D4 41                      	inc	cx
 41359                                  	; 17/12/2022
 41360                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 41361                                  	;mov	di,200h
 41362                                  scsagain:
 41363 000077D5 56                      	push	si
 41364 000077D6 57                      	push	di
 41365 000077D7 51                      	push	cx
 41366 000077D8 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 41367 000077DA F3A6                    	rep	cmpsb
 41368 000077DC 59                      	pop	cx
 41369 000077DD 5F                      	pop	di
 41370 000077DE 5E                      	pop	si
 41371 000077DF 7403                    	je	short scsfound
 41372 000077E1 47                      	inc	di
 41373 000077E2 E2F1                    	loop	scsagain
 41374                                  scsfound:
 41375 000077E4 59                      	pop	cx
 41376                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 41377 000077E5 C3                      	retn
 41378                                  
 41379                                  
 41380                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 41381                                  ; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 41382                                  
 41383                                  ; DOSCODE:B6F0h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 41384                                  
 41385                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41386                                  ;
 41387                                  ; VerifyVersion
 41388                                  ;
 41389                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 41390                                  ; from ES:2A.
 41391                                  ;
 41392                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 41393                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 41394                                  ;
 41395                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41396                                  
 41397                                  VerifyVersion:
 41398 000077E6 268B362A00              	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 41399                                  					;  in ascii
 41400 000077EB B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 41401 000077ED 83C603                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 41402                                  
 41403 000077F0 E80E00                  	call	VVDigit
 41404 000077F3 75F0                    	jne	short vvexit
 41405 000077F5 E80900                  	call	VVDigit
 41406 000077F8 75EB                    	jne	short vvexit
 41407 000077FA 26803C2E                	cmp	byte [es:si],'.' ; 2Eh
 41408 000077FE 75E5                    	jne	short vvexit
 41409 00007800 4E                      	dec	si
 41410                                  	;call	VVDigit
 41411                                  	; 18/12/2022
 41412                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 41413                                  ;vvexit:
 41414                                  	;retn
 41415                                  VVDigit:
 41416 00007801 F6F3                    	div	bl
 41417 00007803 80C430                  	add	ah,'0' ; 30h
 41418 00007806 4E                      	dec	si
 41419 00007807 26386401                	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 41420 0000780B B400                    	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 41421 0000780D C3                      	retn

 41424                                  ;
 41425                                  ;	M068
 41426                                  ;
 41427                                  ; 	Procedure Name	: IsCopyProt
 41428                                  ;
 41429                                  ;	Inputs		: DS:100 -> start of com file just read in
 41430                                  ;
 41431                                  ;	Outputs		: sets the A20OFF_COUNT variable to 10 if 
 41432                                  ;			  the program loaded in DS:100 uses a MICROSOFT
 41433                                  ;			  copy protect scheme that relies on the A20 line
 41434                                  ;			  being turned off for it's scheme to work.
 41435                                  ;
 41436                                  ;			  Note: The int 21 function dispatcher will turn 
 41437                                  ;				a20 off, if the A20OFF_COUNT is non-zero 
 41438                                  ;				and dec the A20OFF_COUNT before	iretting 
 41439                                  ;				to the user. 
 41440                                  ;
 41441                                  ;	Uses		: ES, DI, SI, CX
 41442                                  ;
 41443                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41444                                  
 41445                                  ; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 41446                                  
 41447                                  CPStartOffset	EQU	0175h
 41448                                  CPID1Offset	EQU	011Bh
 41449                                  CPID2Offset	EQU	0173h
 41450                                  CPID3Offset	EQU	0146h
 41451                                  CPID4Offset	EQU	0124h
 41452                                  ID1		EQU	05343h
 41453                                  ID2		EQU	05044h
 41454                                  ID3		EQU	0F413h
 41455                                  ID4		EQU	08000h
 41456                                  
 41457                                  ; DOSCODE:B9FAh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 41458                                  
 41459                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 41460                                  ; DOSCODE:B71Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 41461                                  
 41462                                  CPScanPattern:
 41463 0000780E 89264801                	db	89h,26h,48h,01h		 ; mov [148],sp
 41464 00007812 8C0E4C01                	db	8Ch,0Eh,4Ch,01h		 ; mov [14C],cs
 41465 00007816 C7064A010001            	db	0C7h,06h,4Ah,01h,00h,01h ; mov [14A],100h 
 41466 0000781C 8C0E1301                	db 	8Ch,0Eh,13h,01h		 ; mov [113],cs
 41467 00007820 B82001                  	db	0B8h,20h,01h		 ; mov ax,120h
 41468 00007823 BE0001                  	db	0BEh,00h,01h		 ; mov si,100h
 41469                                  
 41470                                  CPSPlen	EQU $ - CPScanPattern
 41471                                  
 41472                                  ; DOSCODE:BA12h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 41473                                  ; DOSCODE:B734h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 41474                                  
 41475                                  IsCopyProt:
 41476 00007826 813E1B014353            	cmp	word [CPID1Offset],ID1
 41477 0000782C 752D                    	jne	short CP_done
 41478                                  
 41479 0000782E 813E73014450            	cmp	word [CPID2Offset],ID2
 41480 00007834 7525                    	jne	short CP_done
 41481

 41483 0000783C 751D                    	jne	short CP_done
 41484                                  
 41485 0000783E 813E24010080            	cmp	word [CPID4Offset],ID4
 41486 00007844 7515                    	jne	short CP_done
 41487                                  
 41488 00007846 0E                      	push	cs
 41489 00007847 07                      	pop	es
 41490 00007848 BF[0E78]                	mov	di,CPScanPattern	; es:di -> Pattern to find
 41491                                  
 41492 0000784B BE7501                  	mov	si,CPStartOffset	; ds:si -> possible location 
 41493                                  					; of pattern
 41494                                  
 41495 0000784E B91800                  	mov	cx,CPSPlen ; 24		; cx = length of pattern
 41496 00007851 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 41497 00007853 7506                    	jnz	short CP_done
 41498                                  
 41499 00007855 36C606[8500]0A          	mov	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT],0Ah ; M071
 41500                                  CP_done:

 41567                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 - MSDOS.SYS, offset 79A9h
 41568                                  DOSINIT:

 41574                                  	;	  (Retro DOS v2.0, 16/03/2018)

 42401                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42402                                  ;
 42403                                  ;	check_XMM: routine to check presence of XMM driver
 42404                                  ;
 42405                                  ;	Exit:   Sets up the XMM entry point in XMMcontrol in DOSDATA
 42406                                  ;
 42407                                  ;	USED:	none
 42408                                  ;
 42409                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42410                                  
 42411                                  check_XMM: ; proc near
 42412                                  ;
 42413                                  ; determine whether or not an XMM driver is installed
 42414                                  ;
 42415 00007B5F 50                      	push	ax
 42416                                  	;mov	ax,(XMM_MULTIPLEX<<8)+XMM_INSTALL_CHECK
 42417 00007B60 B80043                  	mov	ax,4300h
 42418 00007B63 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 42419                                  		; - Multiplex - XMS - INSTALLATION CHECK
 42420                                  		; Return: AL = 80h XMS driver installed
 42421                                  		; AL <> 80h no driver
 42422 00007B65 3C80                    	cmp	al,80h			; Q: installed
 42423 00007B67 751D                    	jne	short cXMM_no_driver	; N: set error, quit
 42424                                  ;
 42425                                  ; get the XMM control functions entry point, save it, we
 42426                                  ; need to call it later.
 42427                                  ;
 42428 00007B69 53                      	push	bx
 42429 00007B6A 52                      	push	dx
 42430 00007B6B 1E                      	push	ds
 42431 00007B6C 06                      	push	es
 42432                                  	;mov	ax,(XMM_MULTIPLEX<<8)+XMM_FUNCTION_ADDR
 42433 00007B6D B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 42434 00007B70 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 42435                                  		; - Multiplex - XMS - GET DRIVER ADDRESS
 42436                                  		; Return: ES:BX -> driver entry point
 42437                                  
 42438 00007B72 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 42439                                  
 42440 00007B77 891E[6311]              	mov	[XMMcontrol],bx
 42441 00007B7B 8C06[6511]              	mov	[XMMcontrol+2],es
 42442                                  cXMMexit:
 42443 00007B7F F8                      	clc
 42444 00007B80 07                      	pop	es
 42445 00007B81 1F                      	pop	ds
 42446 00007B82 5A                      	pop	dx
 42447 00007B83 5B                      	pop	bx
 42448 00007B84 58                      	pop	ax
 42449 00007B85 C3                      	retn				; done
 42450                                  ;
 42451                                  ; set carry if XMM driver not present
 42452                                  ;
 42453                                  cXMM_no_driver:
 42454 00007B86 F9                      	stc
 42455 00007B87 58                      	pop	ax
 42456 00007B88 C3                      	retn
